name: Castle Ramble
description: Castle Ramble is an infinite Roguelite Platformer for your mobile devices from the developers of Unbroken Soul! Train your king, customize it, and recover your castle from the invader pigs!

name: Bad Roads
description: Go as far as possible with your shipment.

name: Necrotic Haze
description: "Survive and escape an undead nightmare in this cooperative multiplayer adventure. Join forces with others, battle hordes of undead, and find the elusive way out. Teamwork is key in this thrilling fight for survival."

name: Forteresse
description:
Sharpen your chicken's beak, and challenge your opponent in this 1v1 strategy game in simultaneous turns.
Kick the ass of your adversary king... Without an army.
Be smart... Be treacherous... And take risks!
An epic and merciless fight awaits you, take out your wooden swords and get ready to throw stones!

name: Jock Studio
description:
Jock Studio is a BL/Gay Dating Simulator following the story of Ace Anderson, an indecisive and aimless freshman at the prestigious all-boys sports campus, Olympus University. Ace is invited to join a hidden film club and discovers that it's actually a porn studio featuring the sexy jocks and athletes from around campus.

Experience Ace's journey as a new member of the club, interacting with fellow actors, unraveling their stories, and forming meaningful connections that will help Ace find his own purpose.

name: ChillCraft
description:
A clicker game heavily inspired by Minecraft.

You gather resources and then use the resources to craft and upgrade your world and unlock new features. Survival features to be added in the near future.

A simple game to mindlessly click away and forget your life's worries

name: Feasts Seasons
description:
Feasts Seasons is a game where you travel through a world colored by the seasons of the year with vehicle skins.

Go as far as you can to finish at the top of the leaderboard, and receive rewards at the end of the season!
Updates include new cosmetics and gameplay additions.

name: Animal Frenzy
description: Game made for the Playdate device

name: Mickey Mania 2
description:
Mickey Mania 2 was a planned sequel to Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse, set to arrive on the Sega Mega Drive. The game was not officially announced, but its existence was revealed by Jon Burton, co-founder of Traveller's Tales.

The game would have played similarly to the first, though would have featured stages based on different Mickey Mouse cartoons as well as including new mechanics. It was cancelled by Traveller's Tales in favour of the console version of Toy Story, though an early prototype is known to exist.

Footage of the prototype shows a wild west stage and a ship stage loosely based on the 1934 cartoons, Two-Gun Mickey and Shanghaied, respectively. The latter stage originally featured a scrolling floor and a first-person stage that jokingly used a placeholder HUD to parody Doom - these features would be repurposed for Toy Story.

name: Jumpy Skateboard Ninja: The Royale Sword Hero Dude Drive Adventure
description: For the first time ever!.. A ninja on a skateboard? Be ready for an ultimate jumpy ninja challenge! Jumpy Ninja is on a mission skating throughout the streets to find his missing green cape and swords! Simple one touch gameplay! Timing is key. Tap on your device to make Skateboard Ninja jump.

name: BeanShooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Monsters Everywhere
description:
See the hilarious characters of Monster Factory come to life in this fun and engrossing casual game that mashes up hotel management and an international mystery story.

Ever want to take over a derelict hotel and build it back to greatness? Even if it’s a hotel full of monsters? Even if it’s threatened by a jealous rival? Where your only allies are a shady businessman, a dim but enthusiastic bellhop and an erstwhile detective team? Well, of course you do. And Monsters Everywhere is just the game for you.

name: Flipinity
description:
Flipinity is a puzzle game with very straightforward gameplay which can surprisingly lead to very challenging combinations. Your task is to rearrange board tiles using pre-defined operations to assembly either compact image or pattern. One could say that game mechanics is a combination of the jigsaw puzzle and the 15-puzzle.
The game features 96 hand-crafted levels divided into 5 level sets that ensure that the difficulty curve is not so steep. But do not be fooled - to finish all the levels is definitively not a piece of cake. When in trouble, try to spot a hidden trick that each level has in it.
There are 3 game modes: jigsaw-like image assembly, number tiles ordering and pattern recreation. Does the level count seem to low? Feel free to generate a random level for each game mode with the in-build level generator.

name: Pocket Farmery: Idle Pop Farm
description: Welcome to the country side where you start your own farm. Harvest your crops and animal, eventually finding and raising the magical plants and animals that no other farms have. Build up support building to help your harvest grows and get income even when you are offline.Get help from experienced (and strange) farmers to help you develop your farm to its fullest extent.

name: Real Dodger 3D
description:
If you are good at dodging, try this game.
Even if a lot of balls are flying towards you, you can dodge them quickly from side to side or up.
Immerse yourself in the world of awesome dodge.

name: Mass Brawl
description:
Brawl is a game about intense action with super realistic physics. You have to lead your gang to victory in a crime-infected town.
You have to improve your fighting skills continuously, learn to block attacks, punch or kick with the correct timing. Watch your health and energy state. You can pick up fainted opponents/friends and use guns.

name: Red Egg: High Protein Gluten Free Adventure
description:
Red Egg is an addicting and fun jumping game that you wont be able to stop playing.
Continue to jump and score more points, connect with the red squares only and let the super fun begin !

name: Dream City: Metropolis
description: As mayor of Dream City: Metropolis, you’ll build a city of your dreams and explore a beautiful 3D world alongside a cast of colorful characters!

name: Hill Climb Runner
description: Do you love hill climb racing? Do you like to compete with racing cars with four-wheel drive? Then Hill Climb Runner is your racing title because all of the above mentioned and other cool features are implemented for your better racing experience.

name: Velocity.io
description:
Join the battle, choose your drive and survive as long as possible ! Develop your strategy, Blast your opponents, collect speed modifiers to maintain your speed !
Try to survive in the battle as long as you can by taking down your opponents and stealing their fuel! Unlock new Cars with various skins! Complete various achievements to show off your skills!

name: My Newborn Santa: Grow A Christmas Baby
description: This Christmas, take care of Santa and help him grow into the jolly old man we all adore! Challenge yourself with addictive games & customize everything!

name: Melon Truck 2.0
description:
Melon Truck 2 is a physics based shooter game where the goal is to collect as many baskets as possible by shooting melons in them. There are 4 different trucks where you now have the ability to drive the truck to get a better shot.
Enjoy unlimited dynamically created levels for a never ending fun. Melon Truck 2 allows you to change and upgrade your truck by using the coins you earn in game play. By upgrading you will get more melons, more fuel, as well as better reload times between shots.

name: West Ride
description: Explore a mysterious world, conquer challenges in West Ride, an anime-inspired open-world driving game full of excitement and adventure.

name: W.O.L.F
description: Become Wolf, a research staff member, and get to the "place to return". This is an action game that can be played easily with only the mouse! Clear about 50 challenging action scenes while repeating failures over and over again!

name: The Prince Edward
description: The son of King Henry IV, prince Edward, is a very naughty boy no one can stop. One night, in the royal palace, boredom takes over Edward.

name: The World of Nifty Craft
description: The World of Nifty Craft is a 2D Sandbox MMORPG featuring a player-driven economy, classless combat system, and intense real-time PvP battles. Explore the world map, gather resources, craft items and fight monsters. Your Nifty Craft Adventure is written by you!

name: Trump! Jump
description: Help a poorly drawn comical rendition of President Trump navigate his political obstacles, such as a terrible rendition of Hillary Clinton's face, a Hillary 2016 arrow, protests, the FBI, and more. Whether you like President Trump or, dislike him, this game will amuse you while waiting for the train, elevator, or other irritator of your impatience, or play while you are otherwise occupied to help relax you and pass the time.

name: Hollenburg: Hell Castle
description: You are Father Karras, the only one who can enter the hell castle and defeat the dark army and its demonic creations. Explore every corner of the castle and get all kinds of items

name: High Burger
description:
Enjoy your day playing High Burger! You think that you’ve got what it takes to become the ultimate burger maker? Prove your cooking skills by making the tallest burger tower that reaches the sky and beyond with this yummy cooking game for kids.
The goal is very simple - collect the ingredients that fall from the sky, stacking them together into an insanely tall burger Tower. You also have to keep an eye on the recipes - stack the ingredients in the order in which the customer originally placed them. Once you have all the ingredients, simply finish the burger off with top bun. All of the hungry customers out there will thank you for this and you will receive a larger tip.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Complete Cosmetics
description: Look your best during your adventures with the Complete Cosmetics bundle and take your fashion to the next level! All the cosmetic DLC is available in one package.

name: Beans Dash
description:
Winter is coming.
Merry Christmas!!
Time To beat beans.
Tap on the space grid, and beans will dismiss if there are at least two beans with the same color in the cross line.

name: Metal Brigade Tactics Versus
description: The long-awaited multiplayer version of Metal Brigade Tactics! Play against your friends using Game Center, or locally on the same device via Pass & Play. You can also hone your skills against an AI squad.

name: Spartan Wars
description: Join Spartan Wars, a game which has reached the Top 10 in over 20 countries! ! Come with your power and glory or leave in defeat.

name: Roulette VIP
description: Sin descripción

name: Desert Tycoon
description:
Have you ever dreamed of building a mega-metropolis in the Arabian desert?
Play Desert Tycoon and become an Arabian business tycoon by building your dream city in the thriving Arabian emirate of Abu Lumba!
Start from humble Bedouin beginnings and progress step-by-step in building your business empire of real estate, business, energy, and tourism assets. Develop major industries and watch your economy grow right before your eyes as you expand your city and progress to new levels in the game!

name: Fitness Game: Romance Story
description: Get your reading in shape! Fitness romance story is finally here! Romance story game fans, here is something completely new! An indulging romance story love game with beautiful young people who are into fitness. Unexpected events are all part of this love game, an otome in English visual novel that lets you choose your own romance story while playing Fitness Game - Romance Story.

name: Auto Defense
description:
Insatiable alien swarms want to chow down on your castle! But your towers are ready to unleash the lightning, let loose the poison, set them ablaze with explosions, and much more.
Master the art of mixing and merging your turrets to unlock new strategies and send the invaders running! Create any combination of carnage you can imagine with limitless options.

name: Radzone
description:
Psychological warfare, tense atmosphere. Deploy your buildings and units. Make alliances. Wait for the first nuke. Choose how you will respond. Betray your allies. Protect your citizens, nuke the rest of the world. Peace is near.
Radzone superbly evokes the tension, paranoia and suspicion of the Cold War era, playing on the fascinating aspects of psychological gameplay that occur during strategic nuclear warfare.

name: AirTycoon Online.
description: Welcome to Air Tycoon Online! - Authentic turn based airline management simulation game. Play and compete with worldwide users.

name: Join It
description:
Join It is the jigsaw puzzle game wich lets you vividly experience assembling a jigpicturesaw puzzle anywhere you can take your iPad, iPhone or iPod. Absolutely intuitive controls bring the game close to it's real life counterpart.
A myriad of difficulty options make the game playable for all levels and ages with the comfortable play remaining constant throughout.

name: Swipe 3
description:
This is a unique and addictive game of match three to crush, Simple swipe on the screen to match 3 or more of the same color tiles and get as many points as possible.
Is so simple, try it soon!

name: Yumm Monsters
description: Flick candy and feed the hungry monsters! Yumm Monsters is an all new addicting arcade game that will have you swiping for hours.

name: NumTasu
description:
In Japanese it is called 'Tasu' that the calculation adds up.
NumTasu is a puzzle game multiplied by 'Number (num)' and 'Add(Tasu)'.
It is an application that selects the necessary one from the numbers arranged in a square and completes the addition in the vertical and horizontal directions.
Easy operation just to tap the number and select the game.

name: Dancing Lights
description:
Dancing Lights is an abstract, minimalistic puzzle game.
The stated goal is to illuminate all of the lights, but getting there is another story—putting your observational and cognitive skills to the test.

name: Bowling Crew
description:
The lanes are now open, so it's time to play the real-time PvP multiplayer sports game everyone's talking about!
Bowl on every fantastic 3D bowling alley with friends and players from around the world online in real-time as you compete in tournaments and 1v1 games!
In Bowling Crew, you can upgrade your balls and unlock new competitive series as you master your bowling skills and compete with other players online in the quest to be the Bowling King with a strike on every bowl!

name: War of the AI
description:
WAR of the AI is the most amazing AR shooter game!
AI (artificial intelligence) has taken over the world and mankind is being eliminated. Fight for your survival in this augmented reality, first person shooter. It's you versus AI, which higher intelligence will win?

name: Nimble Strong
description:
Ridiculously fun video game that teaches you how to mix cocktails. Nimble Strong is endorsed by The New York Times, Polygon, Engadget, and 10,000+ customers.
Nimble Strong: Bartender in Training is one of the most acclaimed iOS games ever created. It's a full-on bartending course that doubles as a video game. It features an interactive curriculum created by a top cocktail educator (Jeffery Lindenmuth) as well as a deep story and fun game play.

name: Ocraft
description: oCraft is a match 3 oriental crafting saga, where you can play with fruits, vegetables and building materials.

name: Mech Striker
description: In the near future, a massive alien spaceship crashed in Sahara Desert. The scientists found a secret in the spaceship - the alien was preparing an attack on Earth for resources. The humans used the technology from the spaceship and built a transformable fighter - Mech Striker. You, the most talented pilot in the world, are our last hope now...

name: King of the Hill Classic
description:
King of the Hill brings you to the base of an infinitely challenging Hill.
The goal is different based on one of the many modes available, but the general challenge is the same – conquer the Hill!

name: Moonship
description: Journey the cosmic from one solar portal to another. Complete 45 levels of moon bending geometry of fun!

name: Shipmatch
description: Shipmatch, the furutistic flight simulator, is here! Fly alone or with friends in a variety of game modes, like racing, dogfighting, and defending the city from an alien mothership invasion.

name: Temple Roll
description: Are you up to the ultimate Temple Roll challenge?

name: Pixel Manager: Football 2021
description:
You will take the reins of a fallen giant, on the verge of bankruptcy.
Can you lead it back to former glories, taking it back to the top-tier where it belongs?
The beautiful game, always within arm's reach.

name: JAM: Jets Aliens Missiles
description: The Aliens have invaded. Take to the skies and defend the colonies with the most advanced Jets at your fingertips. Battle against waves of enemies and their giant bosses. Upgrade your favourite weapon, or equip a different one for the next mission. Add on special modules to beef up your Jet. Get the highest score multiplier, challenge your friends, and beat others around the world.

name: MatchX
description: Are you faster than the fastest memory freaks? Prove your speed by playing against the whole world and warding off Alzheimer's at the same time! Make all cards go away by matching them one by one.

name: Save the Teenies
description: The aim of the game is simple: to help the very round and very cute Teenies get to a portal so they can go home. But the Teenies will need your help to overcome fire, water, electricity and their endearing tendency to roll the wrong way!

name: Gem Defense
description: Build Gem towers and fight off the sneaky dwarves from escaping. Combine Gems to construct secret special Gems and construct mazes to make escaping difficult for the dwarves! Beware the flying bats that fly over your maze!

name: Ark Saver
description:
Animals come down the line one by one, and you need to rescue them to put them on the ark.
Challenge your brain with this awesome fast-paced puzzle!

name: Safari Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Spiders in the Bath
description:
Spiders ruining your bath time? Webs clogging up your taps? Silk in your shampoo?
No need to panic - simply practice your spider spraying technique with Spiders in the Bath!

name: Loonz
description:
Captured by an evil clown called Eugene, the only way out is to bring down the Circus!
Shoot balloons and release stars, chaining the destruction together to get more points.

name: Puzzle 10
description: Puzzle 10 is extremely addictive “make 10” puzzle game!

name: Lost Maze
description:
A girl named Misty lived in the maze, but the darkness from deep inside the maze has swallowed all the happiness of memory. The girl is forced to take on an adventure that nothing is sure, only you can lead her the way home!
It's easy to get lost in the maze. Navigate the little girl through a series of challenging puzzles and bring back her home.

name: Hidden Object: Mystery of Notre Dame de Paris
description: You have never been so scared playing a game in the hidden object genre. In this game you will reveal the secret of the Cathedral of Notre Dame de Paris, as well as investigate a murder. The more you are involved in the game the more you understand that the murder investigation is covered with darkness and mysticism. You must find a killer and unravel the mysteries associated with Notre Dame de Paris.

name: XeonMass
description:
Control your Angel or Devil to absorb anything smaller than you to grow up.Also, quick slide to burst speed and catch your target easily or run away.
In this high speed war...
How fast you can run?
How many you can eat?
How long you can survive?
Also,
Get Magic items on the battle field to summon meteor showers or a super black hole to defeat enemies. And other players with same country are your alliance to fight together!!

name: Boat Sim
description:
Blast around in a cool speed boat, go sailing in a fishing boat or be the skipper of a large car ferry!
Boat Sim is a boat simulation you can enjoy anytime!
Enjoy a scenic bay in a virtual speed boat, alongside fishing boats, sailing and other motor boats with lots of scenery and various docks and cities to visit, or take out your fishing boat at night, or try your hand at driving a car ferry between multiple docks!
By design there's no objectives, no score to get, simply relax and enjoy your speed boat, fishing boat and now car ferry.

name: Pongmatic 2300
description: A recreation of classic Pong machines from the 70s for the Playdate

name: Backyard Rain Soundscape
description: Nature soundscape audio. Seamless loop for background listening.

name: Manic Miner Engine
description: Manic Miner game engine, made with Lua, for the Playdate console

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II + Dawn of War II: Chaos Rising
description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Fishing Champion
description: This is a fishing game, 100 clearances with different fishes, dual-mode of life and time, in which you can enjoy the fishing as well as enrich your knowledge on fishes at the same time. The background story of the game is the Gulf's annual world fishing contest, in Hawaii, where the fishing enthusiasts around the world gather, in the hope of competing for the Champion title. In addition to the enjoyment of Bay Resort in Hawaii, the fishing champion could also enjoy a trip of Venice.

name: Trololo: The Game
description: Choose your character and dance on the Trololo Set or try out the new Conan Set. Straight from the tv show "Conan" on TBS, the Conan Set contains a nice ocean view as well as a "piece of moon rock" which can be moved around as you dance to the "Conan" theme song as one of the three characters. You can also choose whether you want Conan pre or post Beardpocolypse.

name: Crash Birds
description: Touch and drag the sling control on the right to power. Aim with the accelerometer than release to fire the bird towards the windmill. Try to collect as many coins as you can and fly the bird safetly through the windmill.

name: Squishys Revenge
description:
Oh no! Dr. Spudget has stolen all the squishberries. Squishy needs your help to get revenge! Help Squishy get the squishberries back and save all his squishling friends.   
Squishy's Revenge takes classic sliding tile puzzles to new heights! Move the world under Squishy's feet and save the Squishberries!

name: Patch Catch
description: You should find 5 differences between 2 pictures before the time runs out! The classic game returns with awesome high quality pics and game center leaderboards! Be quick to get combo points, and show the world who is the master of photo hunting games!!

name: Mole in a Hole
description: Help our hero get back to his hole in this wacky fun filled adventure!

name: Find 2: Block Hit
description:
Break tile and find 2!
Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number they merge into one. Each new level is more difficult than the previous one.

name: Sun Stones
description:
Unlock the magic of Sun Stones to discover a truly unique gaming experience.
Drenched in traditional Hopi sounds and visuals, Sun Stones is a delight for the senses. Use transformation, creation and destruction to solve 100+ original puzzles.

name: Fruitito
description: Enter the world of fruity fun where you need to swipe down fruits to fill up your juice bar!

name: Aim Llama
description: Aim llama is all about precision. Ready your sniper and start testing your skills by successfully targeting various objects. Collect coins & use the right cards to complete challenging levels. Become the ultimate sniper and conquer the leaderboard!

name: One Die All Dies: No Zuo No Die
description: Like hard games? Control the hero jump to avoid obstacles by tap on the White area.Help the hero brothers go forward a dashed to the end. How long can you hold? feeling two heroes too easy? Try 3, 4, 5 heroes.

name: Drunk Trucker Joe 3D Truck Driving Race
description:
Alcohol, Trucks, Fat Trucker and a highway are simply things that do not go well together except in racing game.
Meet Joe, he can drive just about any truck you throw at him. From huge cranes, cement truck, Farm tractors and the regular “small” sized road truck. He can drive but can he do that well?

name: Bike Rivals
description:
Are you ready to play the greatest motocross game ever?
Bike Rivals is a new and exciting physics based motocross game from Miniclip!
Be the most intense, competitive and quickest rider in order to get the 3 stars on all the levels, while enjoying the amazing bike physics and fast-paced gameplay! But this isn’t just about finishing each level...it’s about getting the fastest time! Try your best to beat the clock!

name: Racoon the Thief
description: Racoons are hungry and they are looking for food. The only way to get the food at the moment seems to be very difficult, now it is your job to help them to enter into the Big Fat Neighbor's house and...

name: Pop Corny
description: His name is Corny... Pop Corny, and he loves popcorn! He has one dream, one goal, one vision... Can you feed him enough to progress to the next level? But be careful as hunger takes over and Corny starts to black out!

name: Castlerama
description:
Castlerama takes you on a photorealistic walk through a beautiful, detailed and accurately lit 3D setting. Merging real and imaginary elements, it draws inspiration from the charming town of Assisi, in Italy. You are left to find your own way around by touch and sight alone. Exploring a whole world becomes a matter of lifting your fingers.
Our goal? To fool your eyes and brain considering it all real. When you go back with your memory to the day you first opened this Mentalbox, you will think it was you on the cobblestone, you in the alleys, you in the catacombs...

name: Snowboard Hero
description: Experience console-quality graphics, intuitive controls and top-notch sound in a stunning alpine setting and show the world that you are the undisputed Snowboard Hero.

name: Dimension Painter
description:
Escape the maze with dimension pencil and save the gnome's planet in crisis.
Through the map editor, you can create and share your own game. Make your own game using various triggers and blocks. And compete with others.
129 stages! Various level of difficulty! If it's too hard, don't worry. We have walk through also!

name: Parigami
description:
Come and join us on our cosy paper forest, where many new friends are looking forward to meet you! Every day is an adventure in the world of Parigami!
Slide rows and columns to match colourful animal pieces. Make your way through paper scenarios by matching fun animals and Paper Popper Boosters. Compete with your friends and win special bonus prizes in Parigami’s bonus mini-game!

name: Papaye Bang Bang VR
description: Papaye Bang Bang VR (PBBVR) is a first-person shooter game, playable alone or with friends, in which players compete with slingshots and special ammunition. The flashy colored maps and the set of burlesque characters are inspired by the American continent.

name: Indiepocalypse #42
description: Issue #42 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Gylt: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Aircraft Carrier
description: Sin descripción

name: Torn
description: Sin descripción

name: Stickman Fighter Infinity
description: Sin descripción

name: Enchanted Portals: Tales Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rogue Egg: Hatch Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Streetball 2: On Fire
description: Sin descripción

name: Cubes Control
description: Sin descripción

name: Soccer Empire: The Dream Begins
description: Sin descripción

name: Dots & Boxes
description:
Are you looking for a game that brings absolute fun into your life? Well, we have got to tell you that we know about one such game! Want to know? It’s Dots & Boxes.
Dots & Boxes is a multiplayer game that reminds you of your golden childhood days. Yes, this is the very game that has played a big part in our school lives. We want you to hark back to your childhood by playing this game digitally which is created with appealing features and design.

name: Numb3r Catch3r
description: Have a blast building a building while learning some basic math at the same time. Use intuitive controls to become a master builder and an expert in math problems. Have fun competing in the global leaderboards to see who is the smartest of them all.

name: Cell Corp
description: Get ready to defend your human body as a mob of virus is about to invade you. Use your finger to tap on the virus to smash and eliminate them before they pass your screen..Test your mastery of the game and win rewards coins which can upgrade skills your auxiliary-pets in the challenge event.Smash to “Defense war”!

name: The Last Solver
description: Solving puzzles is all you need to save humanity.

name: 4 In a Row:Deluxe
description:
You can get so much fun from 4 in a Row - Deluxe!
4 in a Row is a two-player game and the object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before your opponent. 3 AI levels of gameplay against the computer, or against your friend on same or different devices! This strategy board game let you keep having fun as well as improve your levels.

name: PBJ: The Sandwich
description: Have you ever wanted to make the biggest Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich in the world? Well now you can in PBJ : The Sandwich! Stack endless amounts peanut butter and jelly to build the biggest PBJ sandwich in the world!

name: Mythos Quest
description: Play as Aladdin, the brave young man with the flying carpet; Luca, the good witch from the forests of the west; Rumpelstiltskin, the dwarf with the golden touch; Valkyrie, the winged warrior from the Land Beyond; and Hades, the grumpy but good-hearted Lord of the Underworld. Known as “the Legendary Five,” these ragtag heroes are the only ones that can save Mythos. Their quest is to chase after the dark wizard Morgana and recover the Vita Stone, an ancient crystal that provides safety and harmony to whoever controls it. Without the Stone, the Kingdom will not be able to protect itself against the dark forces of the universe. Eager to prove themselves, the Legendary Five have risen to the challenge and will not rest until the Kingdom is saved.

name: Treasures Boom
description:
Jack, the sea cadet caught in the sea bottle with a map which shows the plan of the island, where pirates hid treasures. He has no doubt for one instant, he is going to find all these treasures.
Great adventures are waiting for you, where you have to help Jack and solve a lot of puzzles.

name: ZenDots 2: One Dot's Journey
description:
Find some chaotic serenity, with ZenDots 2! Sprint your way through mazes, paths, and other diverse creations, while avoiding devious obstacles designed to stop you. Choose your path wisely!
Swipe anywhere on the screen to propel the white dot through each of the 48 handcrafted levels. Knock over blocks, pop dots, and collect rings to complete each level’s mission. Only then will the exit be revealed. Dash to the finish to get the fastest time!

name: Cookery
description:
Our Chef will teach you how to cook amazing dishes!
Don't be afraid to get fat because he uses only fresh and healthy products.
Cook everything you want - sandwiches, soups, light salads and even jam.

name: Iron Hopper
description: Just tap to hop! Double tap for a double hop, but don’t get too hop happy (hoppy?) or your run will end faster than you thought. You will receive daily rewards and coins just for opening the app every 6 hours and you will have the unique chance of unlocking 30 different characters with the coins you earn. When you realize you can’t earn coins because you suck at the game, you can always buy some through the in-app purchases!

name: Magnetic Merge: Number Master
description:
Merge numbers by adding tiles with the same number to the field next to already placed tiles (vertically or horizontally).
Each merge will create a new tile with a number one higher.

name: Bird And Words: Find Word
description: Embark on a captivating word-filled adventure with "Bird and Words: Find Word," a casual and strategic word game that will test your reflexes and vocabulary skills! Get ready to guide our charming bird through a perilous journey filled with words, spikes, and exciting challenges.

name: World of Smile
description:
Why don't these cute creatures ever smile? They need more sweets to build the tallest tower in this amazing new world. And this is not casual - after all, they decided to go into outer space!
Use the non-smiling creatures' springy arms to collect all the sweets using the drag and drop mechanics. Build the highest tower - and finally let them see space.

name: Age of Bingo: World Tour
description:
Age of Bingo: World Tour is a new twist on the classic bingo game.
You can use various items to complete overalls bingo with the goal of coloring all the numbers on the bingo card.
With the points you earn from playing bingo, you can visit cities around the world and build different landmarks.
Each city has its own theme and background music to make your trip more enjoyable and relaxing.

name: Reverb Arcade
description: In the ever-changing battleground of Reverb, can you keep up with the multiplying threats? Surviving won't be as easy as it seems, especially when echoes morphs into a new enemy. We invite you to a vibrant neon world, where a bounce can reverberate into a new challenge

name: Forgotten
description: Welcome to an epic adventure in a CYOF (Choose Your Own Fantasy), DnD-inspired (Dungeons and Dragons) RPG (Role-Playing Game) on your mobile device! In this immersive game, you play as a half-elf, navigating through a classic RPG world filled with danger, mystery, and excitement.

name: Banana Cat Jump
description:
Save Banana Cat.
Banana Cat keeps crying and needs saving. Jump to get to the top and make Banana Cat happy.

name: Tales of Dragon
description: Tales of Dragon is an MMORPG adventure set in a world of powerful dragons. Explore a vast map, team up with other players, and take on these mighty beasts to uncover ancient secrets. Will you become a legendary dragon slayer?

name: Robot Shooter
description:
Test your reflexes in this action-packed, physics-based shooter! Dodge bullets and blast your way through enemies.
Watch how you destroy robots, piece by piece. Then collect those pieces and upgrade your weaponry to blast even more bots!
Sound fun? You bet it is!

name: CatJump
description:
How high can you get?
Become a cat, use various tools, defeat monsters, complete missions and unlock themes to enjoy new costumes!

name: Echo_Squadrons
description: The story is simple... You are the Commander in charge of a powerful Starship Carrier. Your mission is to move deep into the far reaches to space to explore the source of strange enemy ships. Those enemy ships have repeatedly attacked and destroyed exploration ships sent in search of resources need to ensure the human race's survival.

name: Sky High Golf
description:
Playing mini golf in the sky adds new challenges to the game because you will need to keep the ball on the platform. Sure there are some walls to bounce off, but it is the areas between this you will need to be careful of. Don’t Fall Off!
There are over 190 levels to play through. These levels are broken up into 4 different courses, Start Course, Long Course, Star Course and Village Course.

name: Race Pro
description:
Race Pro is an endless racing game with incredible graphics and realistic driving control, in a city.
Drive car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones.
Complete career mode to show off your amazing car driving skills, and become the best professional driver.

name: Real Car Parking Master
description: Real Car Parking : Parking Master is realistic driving experience which will take you to another level! Test your car driving skills with many features like interior view, realistic sound effects, different cars and big cities. Show that you are Parking Master like a boss !

name: Becoming Bytes
description: Reminisce the moment when you first raised and played with virtual monsters, now on your mobile phone with music composed by award-winning Kentaro Sato aka Ken-P.

name: Raising Archangel
description: Minimize taps and clicks! Let's have fun thanks to an easy and fast progress!

name: Geometry Curling
description: Geometry Curling is a game like curling, but using polygons/circles as pucks : move your polygons/circles close to the target, move closer than computer's one! Besides battling with computer, you may also watch 2 computers playing together!

name: Space Run: Adventure Above Sky
description:
Space Run Epic! Sling Escape will take you to an epic cosmic adventure. Fly away from the Earth and visit multiple planets in the quickest way possible. Can you bend the laws of physics and escape velocity?
Tap to blast off your space pod and leave planet Earth in this addictive casual runner game. Rockets doesn't work anymore and you are getting trained to fly a space pod to travel across the galaxy! Your adrenaline level will be on an all-time high when you dodge incoming asteroids and collect bonus points from black holes. We hope you are up for sleepless nights in this addictive action game orbiting planets and more!

name: RC Club: AR Racing Simulator
description: RC Club is a physically realistic simulation of a radio-controlled car: it performs just like it would in the real world! Mind the gravity, control the speed and acceleration and don’t forget about the weight of your car, the friction it makes on the ground, the forces that affect your vehicle, and check how the lights and shadows interact with your surroundings too!

name: Motor World: Bike Factory
description: Produce uncommon motorcycles, make up unique models, make your workers happy, build and upgrade your shops, please demanding clients, and challenge your friends in races!

name: I Hate Colors
description:
I Hate Colors
The Pixel-blob hates all colors other than White.
Go on an endless mission to gobble all the colors that come in the way of the hungry angry Pixel-blob.
Its not easy to catch all of them, the mission gets tougher and puzzlingly awesome as you keep playing.
Enjoy a brain rattler anytime when you want a break.
Go Get It..!

name: HamsterBall Soccer
description: Hamsterball Soccer is a funny football game with simple mechanics. Challenge the AI or your friends in two modes where you can play with up to 8 players in 18 levels with its own unique characteristics. Share your controllers to play with a maximum number of players. A game for the whole family.

name: Rescue To The Parallel
description: Collect allies and weapons in parallel worlds and defeat thousands of enemies. Rescue to the Parallel is a new roguelike game. Rescue characters to make friends, search for weapons and treasure chests. The route you choose extends your survival time infinitely.

name: Rise of Block
description: Rise of Block is an endless game where you avoid obstacles trying to beat your high score.

name: BitterSweet Detectives' Tea Party
description: Bittersweet -Detectives' Tea Party- is an adventure-mystery visual novel game, tracking down the cases left by a mysterious phantom thief named “Beneatha”. It is a tale about seeking the truth, with a bitter and sweet journey.

name: Battle Support: Deluxe Edition
description: The three factions fight for the entire area, build your own army and your two opponents to compete for the area and seize the enemy's supplies You can manage the supplies and troops in your own area Use vehicles and military technology to support your troops and obtain victory.

name: Battle Support: Ultimate Edition
description: The three factions fight for the entire area, build your own army and your two opponents to compete for the area and seize the enemy's supplies You can manage the supplies and troops in your own area Use vehicles and military technology to support your troops and obtain victory.

name: Gold Rush
description: A visual novel styled choice game where you decide the ending

name: CometSoldier
description: "Comet Soldier" is a 2D top-down view action shooting game. Advance through the battlefield and defeat the bosses that await.

name: Cabezurrio vs Robots
description: Platform game in which we control Cabezurrio, a soldier who must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots in its path in several different scenarios. We have a rifle with which to shoot the robots.

name: Bionic Momentum
description: A hardcore old school 2D physics-based sci-fi action puzzle platformer, with an emphasis on retaining speed and momentum

name: Shuvani
description: Shuvani is an isometric roguelite with a Romani-inspired aesthetic, where action and strategy complement each other in a system of magic related to music. Will you be able to escape from the forest?

name: Mage Mayhem
description: Mage Mayhem is a team-based strategy game where you can compete in up to 4v4 battles with your friends competing across different game modes and maps to prove who is the best mage. Customize your character with many different classes, abilities, and perks to fit your playstyle.

name: Tomb of Dread
description: A first-person horror game with emphasis on survival, resource managment and exploration. Trapped below the Egyiptian sands you must find a way out. It's an immersive horror experiance that will leave you with nightmares.

name: Fear Underground
description: Left alone with the horror of the dungeon, the main character must uncover its secret. It is he who will become not only a test of strength and endurance, but also a guiding thread leading to the unraveling of the unknown forces guarding this secret.

name: Untitled Black Panther Game
description:
As announced during the 57th anniversary celebration of the character, the first project for EA's novel studio, Cliffhanger Games, will be an original, third-person, single-player Black Panther game in collaboration with Marvel Games. The stated mission is to build an expansive and reactive world that empowers players to experience what it is like to take on the mantle of Wakanda’s protector, the Black Panther.

Game lead Kevin Stephens announced, “We’re dedicated to delivering fans a definitive and authentic Black Panther experience, giving them more agency and control over their narrative than they have ever experienced in a story-driven video game. Wakanda is a rich Super Hero sandbox, and our mission is to develop an epic world for players who love Black Panther and want to explore the world of Wakanda as much as we do.”

name: Light Heroes
description: A side scrolling shoot-em-up with a feudal Japanese, mythological/sci-fi aesthetic.

name: The Golden Girl Pulls and Licks the Dog
description: A magical girl is suddenly teleported to an ancient enchanted forest filled with licking dogs. The magic maiden can only use magic to pull them in order not to be licked.

name: Alien IQ Exam: Human Edition, Phase 1
description: Challenge yourself with a variety of puzzles in your quest to pass the Alien IQ Exam.

name: First Egg
description: The player plays as a strange animal, the opening of an egg, can hatch different strange animals, devour other strange animals continue to evolve. Fight off the friars who come to capture the alien, find and destroy the portal guarded by the friars to achieve the final victory of the game.

name: Puzzle Go
description: Improve your mental agility with our HD jigsaw puzzles for adults. Enjoy daily relaxation while challenging your cognitive abilities. Choose from a range of captivating images and varying difficulty levels for the ultimate brain workout.

name: Over & Under
description: Jump and stick your way through tons of levels chock full of increasing difficulty, unique mechanics, and minimalistic intrigue. Get to the next level, fail, try again, fail again, try again, and finally reach the next checkpoint-- twelve times. It all makes you wonder... what's in store at the end?

name: Absolute Drift: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong - Full Bloom Edition: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong - Full Bloom Edition: Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - The Resistance Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: DriftHub
description: Enter the world of DRIFTHUB: Enjoy driving and simulation. Have a pleasant time with your friends.

name: VR Tribes: The VR Edition
description: VR vs PC. Show which player is stronger. VR TRIBES is an action-packed online multiplayer battle. One in VR and up to three as PC players. As VR player you have to conquer the island. The PC players have to join together to attack and defeat the VR player.

name: The Game of Life 2: El Dorado
description: Set off on a jungle adventure and grow through every decision. Hop in your Car, Paddle Boat or Copter. Take control as a Map Maker or see what life brings as a Path Finder. Find the Golden City and discover that the legend of El Dorado lives on!

name: My Eggs
description: My Eggs - Side-view game with a physical world, where the player by controlling the direction of the wind moves objects in the game, as well as the main character, who must collect all the eggs and deliver to the destination.

name: Chosen Angels
description: Chosen Angels is a side scroller game where you have to play as an angel, who must cope with not an easy job. Need to have time to deliver all the angels on the right path. The color of their wings corresponds to their color of the door. Do not hesitate, with time there will be a lot of them.

name: Stupid Camera
description: It's an endless run game, a very simple game. In the game, the player's goal is to run many distances and reach the final score.

name: Sages Of Kaboom
description: A fantasy and funny schmup game, with a retro vibe within. The player controls a fighter jet plane which shoots unlimited laser pellets and limited rocket ammo, which deals double damage to bosses.

name: Mask: Beyond Lies
description: Transported in in another world, a masked person guide you through the day to the exit to go back to your world. But will it really be this easy ? Mask - Beyond is an Otome game that features four love interests.

name: Inn The Dark
description: You have been sent to aid in a Triple Homicide case. But you soon find that things are not as they seem. Inn This first person horror game you must investigate the strange super natural on goings in a haunted hotel. Run and hide from danger using only a Flashlight and Camera!

name: PainFighting
description: 《Pain Fighting》, Good Business is a 2.5D horizontal board arcade fighting game. There are cute pixel characters and funny plot. Unlock skills and kills through directional command input. Join us now on this relaxing and enjoyable journey!

name: The Way of Wine
description: Immerse yourself in "The Way of Wine" a visual novel of medieval fantasy and romance. Determine the fate of Ethan, the heir of the vineyards, as you encounter three enchanting girls. Your choices shape the storyline, creating a captivating romantic journey!

name: Unearth
description: Dig for the bones of your creators in this mashup of Bomberman, Digdug, and Lemmings.

name: Parsec Lost in Space
description: Dodge! Speed up! Destroy! Here you will have to challenge yourself to the maximum in order to defeat all the challenges and leave in one piece. Relying only on your reflexes and the movement of your ship, you will have to face everything from asteroids to giant robots!!!

name: Arcadium: Space Odyssey
description: Embark on an interstellar roguelite adventure set in a procedurally generated universe! Battle relentless alien horders, strategically enhance your build, harness planetary resources, and journey across the vastness of space to reveal its hidden secrets.

name: HardBoiledFarm
description: Random item defense game where every second counts! The ants are coming, and I forgot the recipe! The house is exploding! The leaf armor is lacking! Can we really finish farming this year?

name: Last Survivors
description: In the game, you will experience an incredibly satisfying adrenaline rush that will leave you wanting more. However, be sure not to harm innocent humans in the zombie horde. Survive in the post-apocalyptic world, show off your amazing shooting skills, and become the last survivor!

name: Cubic Survivor
description: Cubic Survivor is an isometric action roguelike with a minimalist graphic style. Survive waves of enemies for as long as you can.

name: Chronicles of the Soulforged
description: Chronicles of the Soulforged(“CotS”) is a card-based strategy game that combines strategy, deck building, and realtime combat. Build your deck with powerful combinations and free the soulforged's from its remorese by crashing its enemies!

name: Slinger
description: Slinger features a web-sling and web-shoot mechanic that allows for more fun and interactive ways to battle enemies and move around the terrain.

name: Pinball Arena
description: Pinball Arena is a game that shoots marbles to destroy bricks, using the cooperation between marbles to destroy falling bricks and defeat powerful bosses. In this game you need not only aiming, but deck construction, you can understand it as a card meat pigeon game, but the cards become marbles.

name: Defense of the Kings
description:
Welcome to Defense of the Kings, the ultimate castle defense game where you get to lead your army to victory and defend your kingdom against fierce warriors and monsters.

In Defense of the Kings, you can choose from five different races of warriors: Ancient, Human, Orc, Forest, and Undead. Each race has unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses, giving you a diverse set of options to build your army and conquer your enemies.

name: Kami in My House
description: Kami in my House is Eternarration's first product. It's a short visual novel voiced in English.

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Earth Chronicles 6
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 6!

name: Crystania Wars 2
description: A brand new tactical tower defense game series! Unique roguelike and Unique survival gameplay !

name: Veil: Alter Unknown
description: A mysterious Sci Fi 3D platformer with a grappling hook, glider, and connection lost.

name: Infiltrating a Cult
description: Your mission is to infiltrate a cult with your master. One night, you successfully snuck into the church, but then...

name: Days in Hill
description: A role-playing game,you need to survive in barren hills.Collect, grow, hunt.

name: Castle Caper
description: Sin descripción

name: Polar Sports Vol.1
description: Head back to the Arctic with your favorite Polar pals in four side-splitting games that include Polar Bowler and Polar Golfer. Plunge into exotic waters from Iceland to the Amazon in Polar Tubing, then dodge the zany zookeeper to find missing penguin Ace in Penguins! Polar Sports Volume 1 present found of your favorite games from the makers of Polar Games.

name: Polar Games 2
description: From the tropics to the poles, Polar Golfer Pineapple Cup and Polar Pool promise hilarious good times in the latest installment of Polar Games. Reunite with your Polar Games friends to stroll and shoot down tropical fairways in Polar Golfer Pineapple Cup. Ocean hazards, erupting volcanoes, and brand new comical characters make Pineapple Cup a hole in one! Swing away with one paw and improve your score with power rings that keep you sailing over scorching lava rock! Grab your favorite Hawaiian shirt and head for the green in Pineapple Cup. Take off your lei and travel down to the arctic in Polar Pool, a billiards game played only the way an inner-tubing polar bear can play! Send your bear sliding across the icy billiards table to slam balls into pockets in 8-ball, 9-ball and Power Pool! Play in single or multiplayer mode to unlock new characters and pool tables during play. Chalk up your cue and prepare for Polar Pool. Billiards like you've never seen them played!

name: Polar Games
description: Polar Games is a collection of great winter-themed sports games. Get more out of your favorite bowling and golfing action. Features Polar Golf and Polar Bowler.

name: Dungeon Stalkers
description: Dungeon Stalkers is a PVEVP dungeon crawler game where you can experience the joy of exploration and survival in a classic RPG. Join forces with your companions to defeat other adventurers and monsters, and acquire equipment and treasures. Then, escape safely from the witch's curse!

name: Groove Club
description: Art house game by eccentric creative Antoine Josset. The Groove Club is at the end of Paradise Lost Boulevard. Dont be late for your rendezvous....

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Hell
description:
Explorers of Hell is a ROM hack of Explorers of Sky with several features, for example, new Pokémon, new items, and a very high difficulty. The dialogues have also been modified and are aimed at a more advanced audience.

With Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Hell, you can expect: A very high difficulty, New starters, and new Pokemon from generations 5 to 8. New dungeons, boss battles, and items. New dialogues (lots of memes and humor). The fairy type.

The rom hack was developed by babou.

name: Dark Table CCG
description:
Dark Table CCG is multiplayer card gaming re-imagined: Free-to-play, online 4-player, cheaper and easier deck-building, more customization that matters, and a focus on social atmosphere and building friendships. We listened to everything card gamers desperately want, that AAA is not providing, and built it into an experience that will be unparalleled.

Set in a grim Lovecraftian theme, Dark Table brings a unique strategic experience with up to 4 players battling in a free-for-all, using temporary alliances and mutual interest to get ahead. Select your leader and build your deck around it to survive the onslaught and claim your world.

name: The Secret of Porta Piratica
description: The Secret of Porta Piratica is an unofficial Sea of Thieves fan game. It tells the story of how your pirate ends up on Old Sailors Isle at the start of the Maiden Voyage.

name: Ascendia
description: A rage game inspired by limbo and getting over it developed by Mollkiee.

name: A Dream About a Room With Four Doors
description:
Ever wanted to be trapped in a recurring nightmare? Sure, we all do! Now here's your chance to plunge into a malevolent DrEaMScApE, and to try to find your way out.
A Dream About a Room With 4 Doors puts you in the pajamas of a tormented soul who can't wake up until overcoming the challenges of their own nightmare. Something in the dream-realm wants to keep the sleeper asleep forever -- but now another force has arrived to help find a way out!

This game will be evolving over time, with new puzzles and challenges in future updates. Your support will help me have the time and resources to continue development.

name: Phobolis
description:
Phobolis is a surreal horror adventure taking place within the Phobolis: A purgatory superstructure hidden in deep woods for all who have lost themselves. You play as Moment, a mysterious character that has, by merit of your participation, made the choice* to enter its gates in an effort to reach the top and be free.

There is no death in Phobolis. Each time a person dies, a new manifestation of them is formed at the last gate. However, the bodies left behind return to life as twisted mockeries. Screaming frenzied primal shards of self that others have left behind. Be wary of your self as much as your foes.

name: Requiem
description: We designed this as an experiment to use the concept of a game and a song to communicate something a little different than usual. This is best experienced first on your own with a pair of headphones and no distractions from beginning to end.

name: The Empress: Awakening
description:
Embark on a Mystical Journey with the Ba'als
Venture to the mystic isles of the old gods, the Ba'als, with our hero in this epic journey. Prove your worthiness by battling challenging courses, facing diverse enemies, overcoming obstacles, and defeating the usurping witch to liberate the people.

Immerse yourself in the story-driven hack n' slash game, inspired by the untapped ancient civilizations of the Middle East. The story begins with the creation of the One World, One Universe by the Great Presence and the five Ba'als, and the entrustment of a human, the Custodian, to rule over humanity. However, peace was disrupted when a witch killed the Custodian and claimed the throne. In response, Hadad, the Ba'al of sands, chose a hero to restore peace and end the chaos.

Unleash the full potential of your Rooh powers through 64 possible combos, 16 unique abilities and attacks, 4 distinctive weapons, and 2 transformative modes in the dynamic combat system.

Explore 5 different levels and 9 intriguing locations filled with hidden artifacts and Easter Eggs.

name: Holding Keys
description: Step into the shoes of a food enthusiast and embark on a gastronomic adventure like no other. Unlock hidden taste profiles by holding the keys while preparing a wide range of dishes from various cuisines. Engage in fun time mechanics, experiment with ingredients, and challenge yourself with time management.

name: Meowth's Party
description: A cancelled Pokémon game for the Nintendo GameCube to show the capabilities.

name: Grandmaster's Gambit
description: A different take on the chess genre. Build massively overpowered decks to fend off endless hordes of chess-like pieces and seek out the 8 Grandmasters in this open-world deckbuilding roguelike experience.

name: Magic and Legend: Star Seekers
description:
Magic and Legend: Star Seekers is an arcade platformer with the goal of collecting stars across multiple levels themed on locations around the world with a variety of other game styles in between.
The second in a planned trilogy of homebrew games.

name: Le Fol
description: Le Fol is a 2D game/art proposition inspired by the story of the Fool's Journey, an interpretation of the Marseille tarot. experience life through the iris, choose your paths and the worlds you walk through.

name: Nomltest
description: Sin descripción

name: Doodle Dice Monsters
description: Doodle Dice Monsters is a fast and strategic turn-based game where you get to draw your own characters! Form your six character dream team, then fight in tag-team combat in either multi-player or single-player mode: the winner not only gets epic loot, but gets to take one of the defeated Doodlemon for their own!

name: Call of the VoYD Genesis
description: Top Down Action Shooter with Discord connect for competitions.

name: Aiyra
description:
Join this adventure with Aiyra, the world is in danger, and It's up to Aiyra to save the guardians of the forest so that together they can defeat the evil that is reappearing!

Aiyra is a platform game with action and puzzle elements. In each chapter, new mechanics are introduced, and combined they allow the player to choose their own path! You will face many challenges, dealing with a variety of combat and puzzles involving elemental arrows! In the path of Aiyra's journey, she will deal with tons of demons, and also corrupted animals, that she's not allowed to kill!

name: Thorn for the Villain: Reincarnated as an Extra in an Otome Game?!
description: When an office lady end up reincarnated as a noble lady in an otome game she was playing, she decides to intervene into preventing the story from never starting... however, her actions catches the attention of the game's original villainous underground organization, Snare.

name: Pain Loop
description: Pain Loop is a horror game where you are a 6-year-old little girl named Nina who, after experiencing the assassination of her older brother by a killer with details that remain unknown. She is disturbed every night by horrible nightmares in which her room is transformed into a dark and claustrophobic environment.

name: Hercules V: Platinum Edition
description: 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas follows Hercules on his fifth resourceful ride to save Greece! Ares, Greek god of war, asks Hercules to lead his armies. When Hercules refuses, Ares casts a curse over the children of Hellas. Can you craft your way through countless obstacles and save the kids in 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas?

name: World of Submarines
description: Sin descripción

name: 4x4 Real Off Road
description: Sin descripción

name: Sushi Sort
description: Sin descripción

name: Shopping Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsawship
description: Sin descripción

name: Lumber Inc Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Epic Ape Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: Pooking: Billiards City
description: Sin descripción

name: Bricks King
description: Sin descripción

name: Redline: Sport
description: Sin descripción

name: Panzer War
description: Sin descripción

name: Gas Station Inc.
description: Sin descripción

name: Russian Car Driver: UAZ Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweet Sort
description: Sin descripción

name: Musynx: House Theme
description:
1 Added HOUSE theme default drop interface
2 Added HOUSE theme classic drop interface
3 Rainbow theme vertical drop interface
4 Added new song：HOUSE PLAN

name: Flowerhorn Aquarium
description:
Flowerhorn Aquarium is a 3D simulation aquarium game that mimics the famous freshwater champion fish, Flowerhorn fish. Flowerhorn Aquarium features realistic graphics, with outstanding lighting and natural fish animation. In addition, it plays along with relaxing music to calm and relieve from your daily stress.
Customize your aquarium with different aquarium plants, along with beautiful underwater wood, river rocks, and aquarium fine sands to create a phenomenal, state-of-art scene.

name: Idle Submarine
description: Idle Submarine is an adventure idle - game. Start commanding of Submarine, join the international round-the-world race and become the best captain. The race will not be an easy walk, the opponents are strong, and to become the first, upgrade the boat on the move: engine, production system, jet section, cargo hold. Collect unexplored resources at the bottom, complete quests for Mr. Dave Johnson, explore caves and design your unique Submarine. Seal the hatch and let's go!

name: Daredevil Rider
description:
Only the most daring drivers (or the craziest) are able to pull of these amazing stunts. They need to be one tough cookie in order to get behind the while of a motorcycle and launch themselves off a ramp without any safety net. In DareDevil Rider you can attempt these awesome stunts from your mobile device…without risking your life or a lot of serious injuries.
In DareDevil Rider YOU are the ultimate acrobatic stuntman! Test your skills and overcome intense obstacles to pull off the stunts. You’ll be expected to jump through rings of fire and over obstacles like trucks, cars, airplanes, helicopters...and few other surprising objects. Your goal is to land on the braking ramp that marks the end of the level.

name: Fold & Cut
description:
Make folds like real paper and cut when you’re ready to match to the target shape.
Challenge part is to make less cuts, ideally only one.
It might sound easy but, as the game progresses it definitely becomes more challenging and levels will become much harder to solve.
Be ready for more than 400 levels of fun!

name: X-Plane: Starship
description:
SpaceX is about to fly a Starship to 45,000 and belly-flop to a landing in Texas.
Here's your chance to fly the mission yourself.
And then... try it on Mars.
All with realistic physics.

name: Grand Mini Slam
description:
Grab the balls and take up the challenge in this incredible unique sport.
Can you win the Grand Mini Slam?
Beat all your opponents and reach the top of the rankings in the wackiest championship ever, explore many different courts and game modes and become a Grand Mini Slammers!

name: Football Thug Life Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Island Golf
description:
Island Golf is a simple, easy-to-play arcade game where you play a quick round of golf with fairways on little lonely islands. There's no complex system of club types, swing meters or wind direction here. You just tap, drag, and release to take a shot.
Every day a new course appears. See if you can beat par on each hole, and how low you can score through all 18. If you do well, you may even make the high score board for that day. If not, there's always tomorrow.

name: World Soccer Challenge
description:
Inspired by classic footie games of the 90's, World Soccer Challenge offers an exciting opportunity to replay and be part of the history of international soccer.
Qualify your national team and try to win the International Cup at Russia. You can even go back to Mexico 86 and play as West Germany, Yugoslavia or the Soviet Union.

name: Multi Level Car Parking Simulator
description: Multi Level Car Parking Simulator now bigger and better than ever before! It’s all you’ve been waiting for! Park at the ultra-realistic multi-level car park, in a variety of awesome cars. Can you handle them all?

name: Bike Unchained
description: Download now and shred sweet trails, including tracks from the world’s premier freeride event Red Bull Rampage! Get the coolest bikes, travel the world and build your crew to ride against your ultimate rival - Team Praedor - and battle for a top spot on the podium.

name: Super Final Strike
description: Super Final Strike is a soccer simulator in which you can improve your soccer skills (with the ball, your professional career and the surrounding). You will have the chance to shine in front of your supporters and to invest your profits in order to improve your skills.

name: Magic Tower: Tap Defense
description: Defend the Midgard by building the Magic Tower from the attack of the Hellheim monsters.

name: Maze Defenders
description: Maze Defenders is a fantasy tower defense like the classics. Craft advanced mazes for the enemies to travel, deploy your arsenal of over 17 Towers and cast mighty spells with your Builder.

name: Hill 4x4 Tuning Rivals
description: HILL 4X4 TUNING RIVALS offers you head-to-head racing with hill climb style through green forest and sandy desert against opponent (AI) with different strength. Race and win races to be able to unlock next tiers. Collect racing points (RP) upgrade your car or purchase a better one. If you don't like looks of your car you have a possibility to change color, decal and rim.

name: Clouds & Sheep
description:
They're cute, they're fluffy and they love to play! Care for a flock of adorable little sheep in this excessively cute and charming sandbox game!
The fluffy and sweet balls of wool love it when you play and interact with them. Adorable as they may be, they´re not very smart. If there's a poisonous mushroom, they'll eat it. When the sun is shining, they'll just stand there until they have a heatstroke - and when the weather turns bad, they'll happily stand under thunderclouds and rain until they catch a cold or get struck by thunder and lightning. If you keep them healthy and entertained, they'll reward you with Happy Stars and make lots of little black and white baby sheep.

name: Sled Bandit
description:
He is Bandit, Sled Bandit. Many have heard of this mysterious figure, but few have seen him. It has been said that he is the best snowmobiler ever. According to rumors, Sled Bandit is an outstanding snowmobile handler.
The villagers are rumored that Sled Bandit will make the longest jumps and the biggest flips. He climbs the steepest hills and performs longest wheelies in his snowmobile.

name: Grandpa Rally
description:
Help crazy grandpa in this rally game! Grandpa Rally goal is simple swap tracks and do not crash into other grandpa's. Try to run as many laps you can.
Grandpa Rally is a FREE game with addictive and easy one button game play. Grandpa Rally will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes!

name: Reshape
description: Reshape - the title speaks for itself! Slide or swipe your finger to rotate a central cube, connect approaching triangles by letting them collide with cube. Score as many points as possible and form as many cubes as possible.

name: Hungry Corgi
description:
The game is based on a real corgi who loves to eat! Relaxing and fun music game!
Hungry Corgi is a music game where you feed the dog to music and try to catch the rhythm of the cutest songs created especially for this game. A perfect way to relax and have fun playing the cutest while also challenging rhythm game. Join to corgi adventure to meet new friends by opening characters, listen to fun songs and unlock incredible themes that change everything!

name: Space Combat: Galaxy Wars
description: Space Combat: Galaxy Wars pushes you in a Universe where your team is tasked with maintaining peace throughout the galaxy. Whether its to prevent conflict or protecting civilizations from unthinkable cosmic evil, your team acts as a guardian force for the galaxy. Always the first one to answer the distress call anywhere in charted space, you are there as a protector, answering the call of of duty.

name: The Wars II Evolution
description:
From the depths of the stone age to space wars of the future, walk all the way of the evolution of mankind and defeat the enemies in the new game, “The Wars 2 Evolution”.
At the first glance, the idea of the game is simple and trivial – to destroy the enemy’s base. But it may not be as easy as it seems. To successfully accomplish the mission, you must think as a military strategist. Choose your game tactics at each level and age. And only the right balance between defense and attack will give you a chance to win. Engage super weapons and gain a tactical advantage over the enemy.
Destroy the enemy’s units and wipe the enemy’s base. For that, you will gain the knowledge for studying units and buildings of the next age. The gold obtained along the course of the game can be spent on valiant soldiers who would not let you down in battle and on weapons for defending your base.

name: Sharper Minds: Brain Games
description:
Want a collection of fun brain games for adults and kids that requires no registration? and works offline?
Try Sharper Minds. It's 15 fun games for the brain that require no registration or Internet.

name: Uncle Slam Vice Squad
description: Uncle Slam is a touch-based boxing game. You choose your fighter from the Vice Presidents of the United States – some almost great, some with aspirations of near-greatness – and battle your way forth. Can you defeat all your opponents?

name: Ant War: Kingdom Battles
description:
Gather and stack up sugar cubes to build your glory ant nest.
Upgrade your ant nest to a bigger and stronger one.
Compete with other enemies' ant armies to find out the best player.
Recruit lost ants to build up your army and get a larger colony.
Higher-level nests will hatch more ants for your team.
Free ants can steal from other ants to bring more sugar cubes to your nest.

name: Buggle Blast
description:
Join over 10 million Buggle fans in the newest game in the hit series!
Andrew the cute honey bear is back! And this time he's bringing his bee friends for a honey loving match-3 puzzle adventure! Swap and match your way through hundreds of fun and exciting puzzle games! Collect honey and blast sweet candy with Andrew, the lovable baby bear. Enjoy endless fun times with cute and colorful free to play puzzle games!

name: Space Inversion Puzzle
description:
Puzzle Meets Arcade Invader style visuals in this stylish addictive game from our massively popular Space Inversion game series.
Can you stop the advancement of the alien invaders ?
Shoot detonators to create explosion combo chains. use your tractor beam pull in and move objects around to create chain reactions.

name: The Posthumous Investigation
description: Travel to a noir Rio de Janeiro in 1937 and investigate the mystery behind the murder of Bras Cubas, the famed character created by Machado de Assis. Until the truth is out, you'll be trapped in a time loop, amidst a plot full of conspiracy and treason.

name: Oddsmaker
description: Play as 4 children on a journey to restore the balance of power on Earth after a cataclysmic war & subsequent invention of a devastating weapon has all but decimated human civilization as we know it.

name: Mr. Wings
description: Mr. Wings is an upcoming adventure platformer from linearharu which builds the core mechanics of movement, combat, and dialogues while using 8x8 pixel art and progressive music.

name: Ghetto Zombies
description: Ghetto Zombies is a pixel art action-packed shooter where you must defend the ghetto in a post-apocalyptic world full of zombies. As one of the heroes from the "Ghetto Zombies Squad", you must build new and crazy weapons such as the bubble gum bazooka, paint the city walls with colorful graffiti, and slay the zombies with no mercy!

name: Let's Study Japanese: A Sexy and Fun Way to Learn Japanese - Vol. 1
description: Are you ready to experience a fresh new approach to learning Japanese? Introducing "Let's Study Japanese," an app that utilizes slightly naughty illustrations to make learning Japanese more enjoyable, engaging, and easier to remember.

name: Cute Animals and Heavy Guns
description: "Cute Animals and Heavy Guns" is a fast-paced shooter where you play as cute animals get ready to fight the zombie apocalypse!

name: Professional Fishing 2
description: "Professional Fishing 2" is the second installment of an exciting fishing game that takes you into the world of thrilling angling adventures. Step into the shoes of a novice angler, embarking on a journey with simple yet reliable gear.

name: The Joy of Creation: Story Mode
description: The Joy of Creation: Story Mode was a point-and-click survival horror video game and was being remade from the ground up for the Fazbear Fanverse, Including new assets, new gameplay, new everything.

name: The Joy of Creation: Reborn
description: The Joy of Creation: Reborn was a free-roam survival horror video game that was being remade from the ground up for the Fazbear Fanverse, Including new assets, new gameplay, new everything.

name: The Joy of Creation: Classic
description: The Joy of Creation: Classic was a point and click survival horror video game that was being remade from the ground up for the Fazbear Fanverse, Including new assets, new gameplay, new everything.

name: Magic Tower Hero: DungeonKing
description: Magic Tower Hero features rogue-like adventure with real-time multiplayer battles.

name: Contenders: Arena
description: As a player, you take on the role of a pilot, and compete in a futuristic gameshow that pits mind-controlled robots - known as Gladiators - against each other in adrenaline-fueled matches, televised within the extended Contenders universe.

name: Paranoid: Half-Life for Doom
description: Sin descripción

name: Aikode
description: In Somnium, a world doomed to an endless cycle of death, Aiko, a Kyao created by "The Order", comes across a puppet that will lead her to the worst of futures - her own past.

name: Marvel's Iron Man VR: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Synergy of Serra
description: Synergy of Serra, an upcoming free-to-play PC/MacOS deckbuilding trading card game, promises to revolutionize the card game genre by merging the collectibility of classic Trading Card Games with the infinite replayability of Deckbuilder Card Games.

name: Saria Reclaimed
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Dive
description:
Fly through a number of checkpoints into the finish line as fast as possible.

The Glider has no propulsion, the only way is down.

You can brake midair to slow down and fold in your wings to drift.

Happy Highscore Hunting.

name: Christ's Revenge: Ascension
description: Jesus Christ is back... For vengeance. Jump, Dodge, and Glide your way to the top as Jesus Christ himself.

name: Aojuji Hospital: Tokyo Eidolic Anatomy Division
description: A Japanese horror novel adventure set in Japan in 1999. Confront the mysterious events and anatomize the paranormal!

name: Top Jump
description:
Welcome to Top Jump, an exhilarating and addictive game that will test your speed, agility, and strategic thinking! Race against other players in a thrilling vertical challenge, as you strive to reach the summit of a treacherous cave and secure your position on the leaderboard. Can you conquer the heights and claim the top spot?

In Top Jump, your primary objective is to ascend the cave as quickly as possible. Leap from platform to platform, avoiding obstacles and deadly traps, all while maintaining a lightning-fast pace. Precision and timing are crucial as you navigate through the ever-changing environment, filled with pitfalls and hurdles that can hinder your progress.

What sets Top Jump apart is the ability to manipulate time. In the infinite training mode, you have the power to rewind time endlessly, enabling you to perfect your strategies, explore alternative routes, and enhance your skills. However, in the competitive ranked mode, time manipulation is limited and can only be used sparingly during each run. Be strategic in deciding when to activate this feature, as every instance will cost you valuable seconds, potentially affecting your chances of climbing the leaderboard.

Are you ready to embark on the ultimate climbing challenge? Put your jumping skills to the test in Top Jump and prove that you have what it takes to reach the summit and become the reigning champion of the leaderboard!

name: Beat Head
description:
Unreleased Prototype from Atari Games.

Jump on the tiles that match your color or that have your color and your opponent's color. Jump on enough to fill your spaces before your opponent fills his.

name: Family Guy: Air Griffin
description: Peter Griffin has just spent Meg's college fund on a freakin' sweet medieval catapult. Help him achieve greatness as he tries to smash the record for the world's longest unaided human flight.

name: Saintess Alasdair is Dead
description:
Saintess Alasdair was hailed in Filigree and the kingdoms beyond as the reincarnation of the morning Goddess. Beautiful, pious and powerful, she was forever victorious in battle and perfect in her devotion.

But now the Saintess is dead, her body scattered over the battle field like weeds after rain.

You are Gwendolyn, the Saintess’s much less impressive sister, and your marriage to the King of Assynia will fix whatever complications the Saintess left behind.

You will not fail.

name: ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea
description:
Welcome to "ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea" a thrilling platformer that combines the charm of classic 2D gameplay with a fresh, updated style. Embark on an epic adventure through five enchanting worlds, each with its own unique biome and a climactic boss battle awaiting you at the end.
