In this captivating game, you'll have the opportunity to play as different characters, each possessing their own distinct skills and statistics. Take control of the agile and graceful Angel, an expert Archer with the ability to double jump, allowing you to traverse the treacherous terrain with ease. Alternatively, you can embody the cunning Spec Ops, armed with a trusty Pistol and Grenades, granting you swift movements and a penchant for tactical warfare. If you prefer a more resilient approach, choose the Desert Soldier, equipped with a powerful Rifle and boasting higher health, albeit at a slower pace. The swift and lethal Ninja wields a deadly Katana, making lightning-fast strikes against enemies a breeze. Finally, the valiant Crusader, though slow, compensates with a sturdy shield and a mighty sword, ensuring both high health and formidable defense.

Prepare yourself for a visually stunning journey as you explore five vibrant worlds. Traverse the lush grasslands of the default world, challenge the scorching heat and unforgiving sand dunes of the desert, venture into the eerie depths of the graveyard, navigate the dense and perilous jungles, and experience the wonders of a futuristic sci-fi realm. As you progress through each world, face thrilling encounters with foes specially tailored to the environment, ensuring that every battle is a unique and exhilarating experience.

Throughout your adventure, discover power-ups and collectibles that will aid you in your quest. Gather health and mana potions to restore your vitality and magical abilities, while collecting feathers that unlock new and potent skills unique to each character. Utilize these abilities strategically to overcome challenging obstacles and decimate your adversaries.

Prepare yourself for an unforgettable journey as you dive into the immersive world of "ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea".

Embark on a heroic quest, test your platforming skills, and unveil the secrets hidden within each world as you bring forth the resurgence of the immortal allegiance. Are you ready to rise above the challenges and embrace your destiny?

name: Hop Owl
description: Hop around obstacles while collecting ancient dust!

name: Rotten Apples
description: After leaving your ex-fiancé at the alter, you move towns to find a more adventurous life (hopefully filled with more romance). However, the guys who seem to be taking an interest in you seem a little… off. The new town you’re at doesn’t seem to be as safe as you thought as well…

name: Ani Núbia: Lute como uma Rainha
description: Sin descripción

name: F.O.O.D.S.
description: Decode alien recipes and cook peculiar dishes while solving puzzles and work as a team to become the greatest fast-food service in the universe!

name: Lord of the Wings
description:
Ding dong, your tank is dead. To resurrect her, you accept a quest to take a duck to the neighbouring city under strict instructions to NOT open the cage.

Enjoy duck puns galore, a wealth of truly terrible jokes, and — sometimes spicy but mostly dumb — romance with the adventurer of your choosing. Customise your character, find hidden items to unlock extra choices and enjoy the comic book experience!

name: Teredor
description: Indie open-world MMORPG. Experience a world full of unsolved mysteries in a lovingly designed, handpainted setting. And the best thing about it: You have the chance to actively influence the whole game. You can add Quests, Items, Names and more! You are the Game!

name: Puzzle Girls
description: Sin descripción

name: Ano Ko wo Numaraseru Koi no Mote-shinrigaku
description: Sin descripción

name: Gadget 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Doki-doki Surprise
description: Sin descripción

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sleeping Light
description:
relax

everything will be alright

name: Crymachina: Ultimate Hanamaru Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Crymachina: Hanamaru Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Endless Space 2: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Katamari Damacy Reroll & We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie
description: Sin descripción

name: Agent Jump
description: High speed action 2D platformer that requires strategical thinking as Agent Jump jumps all over the stage using jump pads. Kick your way through to the next level!!

name: Days End
description: Horror First-Person Short Shooting Game

name: Sands of Solaris
description: Discover the magic within the sand of solaris as you complete calm & beautiful puzzles by transporting light through a variety of solar machines.

name: Star Charms
description: Think fast and click charms matching the color of a bouncing star. Idle away some time with this pretty and deceptively simple casual game.

name: Stay Home
description: Stay Home is a breathtaking first-person shooter with co-op for up to four players. Get ready for fast-paced gameplay and terrifying action as hordes of zombies flock to you. You can run but you can't hide!

name: Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery
description: Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery is a game which helps learners to memorize 300 basic words in Simplified Chinese, Japanese, German, French, Russian, Spanish, English or Brazilian Portuguese. Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery is a complementary casual tool that can be used as a part of a lesson.

name: Turi: Kaapora
description: Turi: Kaapora is an isometric hack 'n' slash where you will control the guardian Caipora, with insistent and brutal enemies, discover the forest and its secrets, get all the help you can, and destroy enemy buildings so they can see who is in charge here.

name: Cyber: Mind Dive
description: This is a game in which a beautiful girl sneaks into the spiritual world to explore the secrets of Cyber City. Players need to find the way to the truth in the layer-by-layer randomly constructed heart network world.

name: Corrupt: Political Simulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to be in charge as either the President or the Underworld Boss of your country?
Why not both?

Corrupt - Political Simulator is the answer you've been waiting for!

name: Bad Rats Revenge
description: Bad Rats is a physics puzzle game where rats finally get their bloody revenge on their new prisoners: The cats. Come up with creative solutions for each puzzle using physics, functional objects, and your specially trained Rats

name: KibaGames
description: Fast paced Multiplayer games

name: Payday 2: Crude Awakening Heist
description: Alice Rainey is on the run, she's currently hiding out at one of her business enterprises in the Gulf of Mexico. And like many have been made to learn before her, one does not simply hide from the Payday gang.

name: Reyna Darkness
description: A game with RPG and adventure combination. it is about the mystery that become fundamental of everything in the past. and that was Reyna's purpose, to become darkness.

name: Poetry in Purgatory
description:
Isobel Salvie seems to have everything; youth, beauty, wealth... unfortunately, none of that matters much when you're dead, poisoned by an unknown person for equally unknown reasons. Arriving in Heaven, Isobel is greeted by God herself. All seems well, because as it turns out, Paradise is wonderful.

However, the afterlife's pleasures don't come for free...

Poetry in Purgatory is a unique, ever-evolving story about what it means to live, love and make peace with things you can't run away from... even when you may desperately want to.

name: The Silenct City Chapter Two
description: You have landed in the military outpost where you look for help, however when you arrived. You noticed that all of the military guards are dead. This marks the beginning of The Nightmare. Once again

name: The Sophisticated Art of Friendship
description: The Sophisticated Art of Friendship is a narrtive video game for PC, Mac and Linux. It last about an hour and a half and it is not a traditional video game. We break the fourth wall to bring you this extroudanry story to life.

name: Scary and Dot
description: One gray evening, a feeling of hunger forced you to leave your cozy one-room apartment and walk to the nearest grocery store. However, it looks like it's already closed… Good thing the new diner that has opened near your house is open 24 hours a day…

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Founders Edition
description: The Starsiege Deadzone Founders Edition includes the Base Game, 90 days of Deadzone Premium, 3 Suit Tokens, & 3 Weapon Wrap Tokens. Deadzone Premium grants you XP bonuses, Stash Tabs, Bonus Contracts, and additional Safe Slots.

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Starter Edition
description: Starsiege: Deadzone - Starter Edition

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Ultimate Edition
description: Starsiege: Deadzone - Ultimate Edition

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Ultra Max Edition
description:
The Starsiege Deadzone Ultimate Edition includes the Base Game, 180 days of Deadzone Premium, 6 Suit Tokens, 6 Weapon Wrap Tokens, The Blood Eagle/Diamond Sword Suits, & a cape.

Deadzone Premium grants XP bonuses, Stash Tabs, Bonus Contracts, and Safe Slots.

name: Whale Fall
description: "Whale Fall" is a single-player exploration game where you control various marine creatures to experience the magnificent cycle of life in the vast ocean.

name: Wild West Undead
description: Step into the chilling world of Wild West Undead, a unique blend of Western and horror genres. Explore the cursed town of Los Diablos, face off against hordes of the undead, and uncover dark secrets. Will you uncover the truth and survive the horrors of Wild West Undead?

name: Apeiron
description: Apeiron is a play-and-earn God Game x eSports hybrid that revives the classic god simulation genre from the early 2000s. Players can 'play god' by creating their own planets and controlling avatars in battle. Rule over planets teeming with adorable doods, explore dangerous dungeons, and battle other players using powerful Avatars. As a newborn god, will you choose between good and evil?

name: Ironhive
description: Ironhive is a deckbuilding strategy game about surviving in a dying world. Build your colony, ensure the survival of your people, create a legacy that will be passed on to the next generations. As the Ironlord, you are their only remaining hope.

name: Fortnite: Mainframe Break Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternum Ao
description:
2D MMORPG game based on Argentum Online!

In this fascinating virtual world, each player will create a character with a unique race that defines their physical appearance and a class that determines their outstanding abilities. As you progress through the game, your character will learn skills that will influence his success within the world of Eternum AO.

The choice of your race and class will be in your hands when creating your character, allowing you to forge a unique path in this adventure. Additionally, your abilities will develop throughout the game, reflecting your experience, playstyle, and personal preferences.

Interact with other players and non-player characters in this fantastical environment. Trade, negotiate, forge friendships or take on solo challenges like fishing, hunting or fighting creatures. The possibilities are endless in Eternum AO!

name: E-Genes: Funtball
description:
E-Genes - Funtball is a game inspired in Worms and NES World Cup.

The game is turn based and you can play VS AI or Co-op with two players sharing the same mouse by turns.

name: Sonho TrapStar
description: Sonho TrapStar is an action game set in São Paulo dominated by the infected of a new Covid pandemic and a fierce militia that imposes a curfew and has a license to kill anyone on the streets.

name: Matiz
description:
Matiz is a 2.5D adventure game that brings a color-driven experience, which, beyond the aesthetics, directly impacts the game mechanics, transmitting emotions in the different stages of your journey.

Get ready to enter a new universe with challenges, battles, and many mysteries. Be part of this journey to rescue the essence of colors that were lost long ago.

name: Wizavior
description:
Wizavior is a single-player 3D platform game with rich 2D animations, in which the player visits different planets to save their inhabitants from imminent and unknown destruction.

Inspired by arcade games that had several levels and score accumulation, the player will travel across different planets collecting and managing their current resources, being able to secure themselves with lower scores or take risks for higher scores.

In the Stages, the Player must jump on rotating platforms collecting Crystals and return to a central platform to deposit them, powering up a Spell. The Spell must be kept energized for the duration of the stage, when a Portal is opened to save the aliens on that Planet. The player will visit different planets, each with their own mechanics and peculiar inhabitants.

name: C.L.T.: Cheguei Louco no Trabalho
description: Tired of dealing with endless paperwork and boring spreadsheets at work? Sign contracts and deals and get your breath ready to face another day at the office.

name: Last Equinox: Winds of Change
description: In this 3D isometric Roguelite, control Maeve and fight against the forces of evil that are emerging from her dimension, possessing beings to take control of her world. In each round, choose the magic of one of the 4 elements, but plan carefully because the seasons influence your attributes. Gather points, collect coins, and get ready because each round is unique and different!

name: Confession of the Golden Witch
description:
It is not advised to read this without completing Umineko no Naku Koro Ni Chiru.

Confession of the Golden Witch is a manga-only arc contained within the Twilight of the Golden Witch manga. It follows the life of Sayo Yasuda and the days leading up to the Rokkenjima massacre. Confession is also the only story wherein Sayo directly appears without any form of disguise. [Wikipedia]

This fan-adaptation of the manga chapters in a VN medium contains multiple stories: Confession of the Golden Witch, Abuse of Power, The Cage of Obligations, When the Seagulls Cry.

name: Lego Harry Potter Years 5-7: Character pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Metroid: Opposition
description: Sin descripción

name: Iteriba: Olokun's Wrath
description:
Olokun, The Orixá of the Seas and Oceans, has brought his minions and a huge wave to destroy the city of Ilê-Ifé and punish mankind. To save his people and defeat Olokun, the prince of Ilê-Ifé - Okanbi - will need all the help he can get.

Okanbi will be guided to make offerings to the Orixás with flowers and fruits, asking for their help and wisdom in this difficult moment. Some Orixás help his journey with Gifts and Blessings - powers that use the energy present in all things: the Axé. With the power of Axé and the wisdom of the Orixás, Okanbi can defeat the creatures of the deep and stop Olokun's Wrath!

name: Belladonna's Flight
description:
One of your peers is lying to you.
Staying hidden between fake magicians and scam artists alike, you've built your business secretly selling poison to nobles.

But with business comes dangerous fun. Now, a client has been executed, and the whole poison-selling network may be exposed. You, included.

Every path you take matters. Outsmart and seduce the others, and you may be the one to survive.

name: The Mask: Mayhem
description:
"Butchers" motorcycle club is known to everyone in the city, without exception.
One way or another, they creating problems for all around them. Drunken brawls, trash, loud music and bikes without mufflers.
They don't give a damn about everyone, even each other. A real pain in the ass.
From the outside, everything seems legal, it's s dive bar with stage, auto repair shop at the corner and tattoo parlor in the basement.
But behind the curtain there is a long criminal record - drug dealing, arms trafficking, auto theft, racket, tortures and murders.

this Mod is based on issue from The mask comic

name: Draconiano
description: Deliver justice viscerally, in a frenetic 3d fps old school style where every bullet counts, slide, cover and shoot don't leave anyone alive, you're judge jury and executioner

name: Stickman's Bad Luck
description: Enter the world of a stick man named Stickman who, reluctantly compelled by the winds of destiny, must save the land from an evil stick man named Evil Stickman! Stickman's Bad Luck is a story-rich 2D Metrovania Platformer.

name: Live Cycling Manager 2023
description: Live Cycling Manager 2023 is the ultimate cycling manager game. Select or create the club of your dreams and manage each and every aspect! Become the Sports Manager of a professional team and compete against another 40 teams until you reach the top.

name: Battle 3D: Zombie Edition
description: Military strategy game with zombies. Handle your units from above or handle the unit you want individually. Edit your own missions by adding units wherever you want.

name: GLASS
description: Glass is 3D, first-person psychological thriller that will lead you through an increasingly dark and volatile world in search of an enigmatic author and his mysterious, tragic past. What you uncover will change you forever.

name: Demon Hunter
description: Defeat demons to improve your stats and feel the speed of combat

name: Billy in Bubble Trouble
description: Billy is a Florbz and the favourite pet of Space Princess Leila. He is a happy little critter as he gets snacks regularly and the occasional tummy rub to ensure he feels like he is in Paradise. But one day he woke up and his food bowl was empty.... no snacks.... and no tummy rubbing anymore! Why?

name: Forest Phantoms
description: Forest Phantoms is an addictive horror-survival game in which players beat back the spirits of the forest to keep their fires burning and survive as long as possible.

name: Adamgelion
description: Adamgelion: An action shooter where you're a young sorceress fighting dark forces. Destroy enemies with fireballs and lightning, conquer 20 levels, and save the world. Diverse enemies, arena-style gameplay, and randomly generated levels for endless fun.

name: Dream Of a Square
description: Dream Of A Square, Start Your Square Adventure Get to the final stage with countless falling squares If you make a mistake, you'll regret it endlessly

name: IMPULSE
description: IMPULSE is the next generation of carball. Game play simplicity provides for high-speed, competitive matches. Single player and multiplayer in a Classic game mode or in our new Us & Them game mode. Complete with an AI-powered bot named Vicky. Welcome to IMPULSE.

name: HongKong Noir
description: This is a Hong Kong noir action game from the 1980s.

name: Sokoban 3D
description: Move the cubes to their correct locations and solve the levels.

name: Cute Hentai Waifu: Numbers
description: 2048 puzzle game with relaxing music, and cute waifus.

name: Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos
description: "Unleash your inner rebel in 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos', an 80s-90s arcade-style game set in Milwaukee's punk scene. Fight through 13 levels at iconic venues, aided by lo-fi 8-bit renditions of Murder Generation's music. Battle enemies, assist friends, and claim your punk icon status.

name: Nightsteel Survivors
description: Nightsteel Survivors is a 2D shooter with "roguelite" elements set in a dangerous robot-filled laboratory. Choose from various characters with unique abilities and face challenging bosses. Upgrade your skills and equipment to survive and escape the Nightsteel labyrinth.

name: Escape Shadow Storm
description: Escape Shadow Storm is a story-oriented pirate themed set of escape rooms. Each room requires the completion of a bamboozling puzzle to progress. Players will encounter a series of interesting hidden items, hazy riddles, and unpickable locks. Experience the magical story and swashbuckling adventure.

name: Floral Gate: The secret of sexual practices
description: Improve your xxx life quality and add more spice to your xxxlife. There are games for two players as a couple.

name: Dual Chroma
description: Journey alongside the Second Prince of the Galens Empire to unlock ancient secrets in this romantic fantasy adventure visual novel with a dark twist. With multiple endings and immersive battle sequences, will you write your own destiny, or repeat the mistakes of those whom history has forgotten?

name: Ricky's Furry Duck Hunt
description: Join Ricky as he hunts some ...peculiar... looking ducks in this arcade-style point-and-click game.

name: Beast Blasters
description: Play as the Beast Blasters themselves to go ahead and blast the beast and have a feast!

name: Mana Sisters
description: Mana Sisters is a captivating 2D puzzle game. Match cards to unveil a magical world of diverse spellcasters, challenging your memory as you enjoy soothing sounds and one-handed gameplay.

name: Faster Racer Boom Boom
description: Ultimate contest of wreckage and devastation, Faster Racer Boom! Boom! pits players against each other in various arenas, using their vehicles to destroy their opponents and complete numerous objectives!

name: Cleanup Project
description: A 3D exploration game, where your goal is to clean up your neighborhood. But litter on the sidewalk isn't the only problem you'll need to solve.

name: Cotton Tale
description: Cotton Tale is a deceptively difficult precision platformer. Hopping is the name of the game. Each jump is precarious and getting to the top will take everything you've got. The journey may be long, and your falls may be great, but remember... failure is part of the fun!

name: Dark Past Darker Future
description: Step into the grim and dystopian world of "Dark Past Darker Future," an intense single-player arena shooter that will push your skills to the limit. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled FPS experience.

name: Star Keeper
description: Curious why gamers in the 80s were so addicted to NES games? Star Keeper will take you on a journey to experience the joy of staying up all night to beat this NES game!

name: Clear the Train
description: While cleaning the train, you can use a gun or a shotgun, if you don't want to use bullets, you can use your katana. Kill the zombies that damage you by exploding both from a close and a distance and try to pass the wagon as much as possible.

name: SuperKraft
description: Welcome to "SuperKraft," an immersive 3D survival crafting game! Explore stunning landscapes, hunt animals, and craft powerful tools. Encounter creatures, battle foes, and earn legendary rewards!

name: Midnight Dreams
description: In Midnight Dreams, embark on a psychological horror adventure, playing as Felipe, a boy with a unique perspective. Trapped in a space station on the brink of destruction, overcome dark obstacles, unravel secrets, and join Felipe's quest for truth, freedom, and forgiveness.

name: Team Six
description: A squad-based strategic action game where you command six types of special units to complete missions. It offers a variety of gameplay options, including large-scale battles, infiltration, sniping, and armored warfare.

name: Heart of Iona
description: The Heart of Iona is Narrative Game where choices shape the story. During Ella's coronation, the castle is attacked, leading her to a secret chamber with a trapped dragon. Freeing him sets off a chain of adventures, as Ella learns the power of her heart to alter the Kingdom of Iona's destiny.

name: Luyen Nguc
description: Luyện Ngục consists of a total of 26 floors, divided into 5 areas: Ruins, Green Forest, Cave, Desert, and Deathland. Each area has its own story, unique space, and different (cute) monsters.

name: Hoverkitty in The Hoververse: Chapter Two
description: Hoverkitty is back, and she needs help. Help Hoverkitty as she goes on a epic adventure, where the choices she makes lead her on a journey that could save, or destroy, the Hoververse.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Marine Forces Outfits Pack
description: Customize your agent like a Marine Forces soldier with this armed force themed pack. Four unique camouflaged-patterned outfits.

name: A Chinese Ghost Story 2023
description: This game tells a touching love story. Ning Caichen is an scholar. On his way to Guobei County to collect accounts, he encountered heavy rain and had to hide in Lanruo Temple. In the temple, he met a pretty ghost named Nie Xiaoqian. later, they fell in love with each other, and the story unfolded...

name: 8-Bit Rebellion!
description: 8-Bit Rebellion! was a mobile app developed by Artificial Life, Inc. featuring the American rock band Linkin Park. It featured retro inspired graphics and beat 'em up gameplay, as well as social connectivity including message boards, private messages, and customizable apartments that other players could visit. Completion of the game rewarded an unreleased song which at the time was exclusive to the game.

name: Guardian Goddess
description: We are recruiting gamers from the World Government! Control an immortal Guardian to destroy enemies and grow indefinitely!

name: Road to Valor: World War II
description:
Road to Valor: World War II is a real-time PVP strategy game where you can compete with global players around the world as a General of World War II, the biggest war in history.
Select “Command” that suits your own strategy style and collect various units to build the strongest troops. Fight against swarms of enemies in the realistically presented battlefield. Destroy enemy Headquarter and bunkers to get medals as well as the most glorious victory!

name: Drive Cars: Avoid Traffic
description:
A new gameplay just launched!
Drive your favorite car and avoid traffic!
Get your best distance and share with your friends !
A great isometric city build for you!

name: Blitz Racer
description: Blitz Racer 2.0 has the same sleek isometric design, unique controls, and challenging gameplay that you love, but with tons of new tracks and tunes to experience. This version features a retooled difficulty arc and the ability to collect lives to resume your game, prolonging the Blitz Racer experience.

name: BMX Backflip King
description:
BMX Backflip King.
Easy to play, but hard to master.
This bmx kid loves back flipping, though he's not to good at it.
Help him to land his backflips by tapping the screen to rotate.
Land level with the ramp to keep his speed up.
More speed bigger air. bigger air, more points.
Collect Cash to unlock a new track.

name: Swing Robot
description: Tap to change direction and swing the robot,don't touch metal pieces.

name: Illusion Squares
description: Illusion is image based minimalistic puzzle game. Just rotating pieces for solve coded image. This game is the perfect for jigsaw lovers. Best choice for relaxing and fun with your family.

name: Solitaire Dash
description:
Feel the rush of Solitaire on steroids! Presenting - Solitaire Dash!
Help King Sol match the falling cards with Solitaire rules! If you know how to play Solitaire and want a quick game, Solitaire Dash is for you! Keep your eyes out on the falling cards and match the appropriately!

name: Blocky Fills
description:
Great, fulfilling time waster: Fill the board with the same colour before you run out of moves.
Gameplay: tap one of the color buttons at the bottom of the screen to fill all neighbours with the same color. Once you do that with the whole board, you win.

name: Wild Leopard Safari
description: A Furious and young leopard exist in medieval forest and for survival he has to face many wild animals because the only way is to fight them.Play animal family simulator games in 2019 and discover the life of young leopard with his clan in wild adventure forest and not just this greeny forest you can also stray in Snowy Forest by discovering it with your wilderness skills.

name: Eleventh: Unsacred
description: the last of the last eleven: the director, another seven

name: Felonian Special Forces
description: A sci-fi 3d shooter game set on the planet of Felonia. Command units to defend friendly facilities and attack enemy facilities. Fight on foot and also using vehicles.

name: Sea Rivals VR
description: Raise the periscope! Get ready for intense naval battles, captains: torpedo your rivals, dodge your adversary's attacks, and dominate the sea.

name: GasCraft
description: This is a casual gasoline battle game where players need to control a small car to increase points by collecting gasoline on the map, while also paying attention to avoiding bombs chasing around.

name: Hotline Omsk
description: Hotline Omsk - 2D Top-Down shooter where you play as a brutal bandit whos only goal is to terminate other bandits for the sake of survival. Expect dynamic and hardcore shootouts in the narrow-spaced interiors of multi-storey panel buildings, with just one attempt to escape without taking any damage.

name: For Double
description: For Double is a side-view game where the player controls rectangular figures, dodging dangerous figures, jumping on platforms that randomly change and move, the game has the possibility of a competitive game for two.

name: The Wand Wizard
description: Create insane combinations of power and break the game in every possible way to get your name on the leaderboards! Each round you evolve but the enemies increase...

name: Burning Calories
description: Burning Calories is a side view runner in which you have to run away from a huge bun. Food delivery men are running to meet you and huge hot dogs are lying around. Jump over them or shoot them with a pistol. By the end of the day, you will lose quite a few pounds!

name: Fight For Your Resurrection VR
description: Fight For Your Resurrection is a fighting game with dynamic A.I., gamepad support. When You loose a match the difficult level decrease! When You win consecutively two matches the difficult level increase! I dare You to finish the game never losing a match!

name: Clickart
description: Click Art is a clicker with a side view, where the player clicks monsters, buys improvements, pumping up monster destruction as well as click damage levels, progressing through new levels and discovering new worlds and types of monsters.

name: Octopus Trouble
description: Octopus Trouble - A game with a top view, you control an octopus that fights off sea enemies by shooting bubbles and collecting fish eggs, which gives him strength and the ability to live to the end.

name: Pandora
description: Pandora brings a mix of the moba genre with soul mechanics, destroy towers and fight different enemies with an innovative playstyle, use mounts and pets to help you during your gameplay.

name: Ultimate Front
description: In Ultimate Front step into the role of an archer and defend or conquer a castle in a team. Battle on two unique maps against various enemies using your bow and unlimited arrows in a VR environment. Play with up to 4 players in VR arcades and compete in individually configurable leaderboards.

name: QuizFizz
description: Do you really know your friends or would you like to get to know them?

name: Planetgore
description: A sci-fi horror roguelite where you use advanced-tech weapons to defend yourself against a horde of deadly aliens on a dangerous planet. Choose from diverse power-ups, weapons, and characters to survive and unveil the mysteries of the alien world.

name: Chickenality
description: Chickenality - A top-down game, you control a chicken in an arena where enemies appear, in each level you find yourself with a unique weapon, ammo, health packs and explosive barrels. Challenge yourself to last as long as possible.

name: Burn Them
description: Burn Them - A top-down game where the player, using a flashlight of his choice, burns monsters and collects different items from chests to help him in a strange and gloomy world of different labirint-shaped corridors, as if the hero was in his scariest nightmare.

name: Typhon: Bot vs. Bot
description: Typhon: BvB is an online multiplayer game that takes place in a future world where players take on the role of pilots, people whose job is to program bots to fulfill a variety of missions. From resource gathering to combat, and more.

name: Vulture: Unlimited Frontier - 0
description: This is an action game in which the player builds and controls a giant robot. The game features ground crawling 3D maneuvers, customizable elements, picturesque characters, and scenarios. Even those who have never been good at action games will surely find that Vulture will respond to their needs.

name: Mini Ranger
description: Play as a space ranger, who has been tasked to defeat the evil Techno Dragons, who have inhabited an old planet in the hopes that they can get to controlling the world! Stop them, Ranger, before the dragon's plan comes to completion!

name: Fly Fly Dragon!
description: Embark on an epic adventure as a mighty dragon in "Fly Fly Dragon!"

name: BabyRace
description: 《Baby Race》is a multiplayer casual game. Players will compete with other players on the same stage, competing in various modes such as parkour, survival, racing, and bomber etc. Eventually, they will continue to compete in rounds of battles until only one player is left to win the game.

name: Sugar Bear
description: Sugar Bear is a fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled adventure where speed is your ally and the forest is your playground. Collect Sugar, unleash speed, and own the forest in this fast-paced adventure. Can you reign supreme?

name: Project D
description:
“For this game, we used the works of Rutger Bregman and Yuval Noah Harari as reference for thinking about humanity in the future,” co-founder and artist Hiroco Shiino said in a video featurette. “The game takes place in a future that could really happen. It’s about daily life in a place called Rakuen (paradise). I think the problems presented in this game will be very familiar to us in the real world.”

Co-founder and programmer Akira Mitsuhashi added, “This title was Hiroco’s idea, so Hiroco is the key person for this project. And I listen to Hiroco whenever she has questions, and we come up with a vairety of ideas together.”

name: Numb: Just Don't Think About It
description: Numb - Just Don't Think About It plunges you into an unsettling 2D horror experience where your sanity is your only lifeline.

name: Blade Runner 2033: Labyrinth
description: Set between the original film and 2049, Blade Runner 2033 takes place after the events of the Black Out and asks: what does a Blade Runner do when there are no Replicants left to hunt?

name: We Kill Monsters
description: We Kill Monsters is a solo or co-op adventure set in a mysterious and massive pit. You are a Husk of Edinu, homunculi created to explore the depths and hunt Angels.

name: 8-Bit Slasher 4-in-1 Horror Demakes
description: Friday the 13th: Return to Camp Blood, Halloween: October: 31st, A Nightmare on Elm Street: Son of a Hundred Maniacs, and Candyman: Be My Victim. This is a multirom that combines all 4 games.

name: Backdraft
description: Backdraft is a deckbuilding adventure that transports you to the magical world of Arcadia. Defy monstrous adversaries, wield the raw power of your cards, and carve out a legacy amidst a relentless battle for survival.

name: Blitz Football 2023
description: An American Football management sim that allows the user to build their own American Football dynasty. Build and manage a team ready for the big games, with a mix of newly drafted youth and league super legends! Apply your Playbook tactics and you'll be ready to take your franchise to the top!

name: Daddy Moto Racing
description:
Dare to drive through the traffic in Daddy Racing Moto
Drive the fast motorbikes between the traffic, collect coins, obtain the highest speed with the nitro and make the highest scores in the exciting Daddy Moto Racing game.

name: Anime Sniper
description:
Anime Sniper is a sniper shooting game with anime girls from "Shoujo City" dating simulator.
To fight the alien invasion of Tokyo, Laika, Anette, and Yumi join an elite sniper team and must train their shooting skills by going through progressively more difficult missions.

name: Basketball Simulator
description:
See if you have what it takes to lead a basketball team to glory by testing out your coaching skills with Geeked-Out Basketball!
Use your knowledge of strategy and tactics to get your players performing on the court, while also keeping the locker room on your side and building chemistry within your team.
Your dreams of becoming a top basketball coach have never been closer to reality. All you need is right at your fingertips.

name: Blocks Racing
description:
Blocks Racing is classic kart racing game madness. Speed your way through 55 unique tracks equipped with shortcuts for advantage. Unlock new racers with varying stats based on the vehicle design.
Collect power-ups to use weapons like missiles or shield boost for competitive advantage against other rival racers. Blocks will fall off the race karts when damaged and eventually break apart. Can you survive and race to the finish line?

name: Casino Resort
description: Casino Resort is a mobile social online multiplayer casino game from the Japanese game developer and publishing giant, Colopl. Have fun building and managing your own casino resort while checking out the casino games!

name: Devil Ninja Fight: Kungfu combat
description: Devil Ninja Fight is a Fast paced and super addictive ninja game.In this face paced fighting game,your goal is to kill enemies and Monster on the devil's land. And there are various props to increase your combat effectiveness.

name: Difference Games
description: Each level is comprised of two images which contain subtle differences. Don't worry though, if things get too hard you can touch the hint button to get a nudge in the right direction.

name: Dragonstone: Kingdoms
description: Will you send your heroes on new quests or raise armies to march against your friends or will you lead your Guild to ultimate victory over the millions of other players online? In the world of Dragonstone your options are endless!

name: Geometra - Join the Colors
description:
Geometra ...
... is tricky
...it's fun
...is addicting
... will drive you out of your boredom!
Play now Geometra and combine objects of the same color to create a new high score.

name: JeweLife: Match 3 Jewels
description: JeweLife is a match 3 puzzle with fantastic Relaxing Mode and stunning visual and sound effects!

name: Keep Combo
description: In the year of 2009, A Jump game let mobile phone casual games be popular. Ten yeas past, though hip an hop games seem to be out of date, I still have a fondness for hip and hop games. With this specil affection, I make a game, KEEP COMBO, to pay my respects to all casual games which had touched my heart, also to pay my respects to the palyers and gameplatforms at that time.

name: Last Walpurgis
description:
Last Walpurgis is a tower defense battle game in which you collect witches scattered around the world to fight against humans.
Tower defense type battles involve over hundreds of dot characters. Each character fights on its own initiative, but you can also activate powerful Ultimate Skills at your command.

name: Little Helper of the House Kitchen
description:
'Little Helper of the House' game series are taking place in the rooms and in the living places of our big house. 2 heroes of our cute family are wearing their little helper aprons and learning how to do the houseworks by helping their parents with fun.
In this episode of our series of “little helper of the house”, we have academically and socially designed the game aiming a solid improvement and provide support in the learning curve of our pre-elementary level children by experiencing everyday duties and bonding with their parents in achieving them.

name: MiniPix Jump
description:
Prevent your character from falling and go as high as possible in this fun, easy to handle and very, very addictive game.
 Unlock more than a hundred characters! Don’t forget to collect coins and take care of the obstacles that will be on your way...

name: Super Contraption 3D
description:
Super Contraption 3D is a database driven 3D physics sandbox game with powerful capabilities.
This is not for everyone! The building process can be complicated. Only people who want to tinker around in a physics sandbox should try this.
Since this is a physics simulation game it should be played on a relatively modern device, preferably plugged into power.

name: Trade Mania 2
description:
Play a sequel of this amazing economic strategy game, combining the best features of economic board games with realistic settings in the world’s most fascinating great cities.
The new game has incorporated most of the suggestions received from players. It features more dynamic gameplay, sophisticated virtual competitors, and a great variety of strategic solutions.

name: Teenage Crush Love Story Games
description: Hello, teenagers! Are you ready for an awesome love story adventure? Are you looking for high school games with high school love storyline? Are you willing to help an attractive heroine win the heart of the boy she likes?

name: Tiny Pirate Ship
description: Ahoy, fearless seafarer! Prepare to embark on a thrilling voyage of vengeance like never before! Welcome to Tiny Pirate Ship the ultimate game where you take command of a pirate ship, engage in epic ship-to-ship battles, and embark on a treacherous quest to collect loot, all in your pursuit of retribution against the mighty Kraken!

name: WarShip War Navy Fleet Combat
description:
Warship War – Navy Fleet Combat is the best game allowing you to experience the famous naval battles of the Second World War.
You can be an admiral of a navy fleet and lead numerous battleships, aircraft carriers, destroyers, submarines, and gun ships, which are made based on a thorough historical research.

name: WorMoon: Awakening
description:
Embark on an epic journey in worMoon Awakening - A fast paced card battle game with some RPG and innovative roguelite mechanics to create a simple, fun and replayable game.
Build your deck of nine cards by combining the power of your team of heroes. Unleash the forces of nature with Bo, wield powerful magic with Ash, and uncover the enigmatic hero Jomei's secrets.

name: Purrfect Catch
description:
The Dogs need your help! Work together with your feline companion to save the dogs across all manner of magical levels!
A cat-astrophe has occurred, giving the dogs an unwanted bath. Band together with your Cat and Rod and bring them back to dry land. Customise your equipment using the Locker Room, and use unique perks to save more dogs than ever before - and don't forget to go for the high score.

name: Racing Combat
description: Racing Combat is super fun multiplayer racing battle game. Are you a hero racing fighter for your top position? than let's clash with real opponents worldwide or with your friends. Win races to discover new awesome cars & power cards. Upgrade your power drivers to defeat other traffic rider in real-time. Form Gadgets to Weapons to Spells, Racing Combat has dozens of cards to load in your combat deck. Win Trophies and Chests to lead your path to victories!

name: Mister Smith & His Adventures
description:
The action-packed comedy adventures of Mister Smith, where you select your path!
Make your way through interactive comedy plots in Mister Smith & His Adventures where you decide how the adventure ends. Be clever or dumb, kind or evil, logical or insane – the choices are yours and each outcome is unique! Which is more important: your phone or your date? Who would you save: yourself or your cat? What is the capital of France? Oh yes - as well as the storylines there are trivia quizzes! Everybody loves quizzes!

name: Mecha Kucha Gacha Defence
description: Try your luck! Mecha Kucha Gacha Defense is a pixel gacha defense game. It is a game to smash enemies by summoning units through gacha. If you think you're running out of luck, get more units with more payments(free)!

name: Curfuffles
description:
Play the fastest, funnest, truly unique word puzzle game!
With 44 Different Languages to choose from, play, and learn!
Take on dozens of surprising levels in the Main Mode - from Lightning to Lighthouse and so much more! Fly through the solar system and find rare and unusual items and planets in Space Mode. Collect over 75 unique Birds, Flowers, and Sea Creatures in Curfuffles Mode! Discover the secrets of the game as you go, with infinite lives!

name: Bike Trials Offroad 2
description: We know that you're going to ask for another one so here we are again for another part of Bike Trials: Offroad! If you ain't challenged on the first one, this second part is going to blow your mind! From crates, rocks, logs and other crazy platforms plus plenty of mine bombs! It's going to be an explosive drive that will make your adrenaline pumping!

name: Motocross Mini Outrun
description:
Out run the cops, collect cash and unlock new Cool Mini Motocross Bikes.
All bikes have different power and handling control.

name: 3D Water Bike
description: Feel like a rider on a water scooter. You are taking part in the global competition of the best drivers on the water scooter (clarification: a scooter that is in water) and your task is to get the title of the best in the world.

name: Plekos
description: Plekos is a fresh take on the popular Coin Soccer game, played on a wooden board with nails representing the players and a coin by way of a ball. In this version, the coin has been replaced by a bottle cap, and you can play against the computer, or have your own Cup championship, with up to eight players offline on the same device.

name: Cut WallStreet2
description: Sin descripción

name: Bounty Hunting Time
description: At a tavern It is where adventurers come together to form a team to hunt for the bounty of monsters that are dangerous to humans. This is an Action Roguelite game where you build a team and develop a character that people like to swarm with monsters that will flock to your team to crush …or not

name: Family Adventure
description: This game in unique. It has beautiful texts. It has nice talks. You play 4 different characters which are family members. You enbark on a journey together as a family. Game has 41 quests. We are adding more.

name: Let's Bounce! Popsicle Boy!
description: Help little boy Toto sell more Popsicles with the Popsicle Bouncer in this challenging NES/FC-inspired retro action game. Challenge various funny themes and difficult levels to earn more coins!

name: Prediction Game
description: It's a game to predict what it will say by looking at pictures and names.

name: Small Tank
description: This is a classic retro 2.5D tank battle game. Familiar gameplay and simple operations allow players to control their tanks and engage in shooting battles with other tanks in the game, requiring them to be completely eliminated. Of course, when eliminating enemy tanks,

name: The Pit
description: The Pit is a 2D pixel platformer with precise jumps, coin collecting and enemy encounters accompanied by a dark atmosphere and soundtrack. One or more missed moves can cost everything. Man up and defeat the evil!

name: Tides of Despair
description: After a shipwreck, you are one of the survivors. To Survive you will need to fight for your life.

name: Link Track
description:
"Link Track" is a very interesting puzzle game.
This game provides two type of puzzle modes: Color Link mode and Number Track mode. Each mode corresponds to a unique puzzle mechanism.

name: Hexa Knot
description:
Simple, minimalistic puzzle game.
Relax with simple rules. Your goal is to swap hexes to make colorful knots.
Small levels are easy, but larger will challenge your patience and perception.

name: Cat Raid
description:
Defend the Earth from the attack of huge cats from outer space!
Bounce the flying cats by using a trampoline.

name: Bubbles Popper 2
description:
Destroy as many bubbles as possible to move to the next level.
Select group of 2 or more same colored bubbles and they will disappear adding point to you.
Number of point for each removed bubble depends on number of bubbles in the removed group.

name: Flappy Brolly
description:
A easy get started shooting game, one-handed operation, shot +1 points, while miss the target -1 point, the difficulty level will be incremental.
Each scene has a random background and music, with the rumble of cannon, have some relaxed leisure time.

name: Toy Swipe
description:
Winner of second place in Buildbox Game Jam.
Santa spilled his sack of presents all over the room.
One last toy needs to find it's way under the tree.
Swipe the toys and clear it's path to the gift box.
Enjoy Toy Swipe this Holiday season.

name: Logic Master Detective 3
description: Detective Morgan is back with 50 new logic puzzles for you to master.

name: Photo Spot
description:
Photo Spot: Global Challenge takes the classic touch screen “spot the difference” game to your iPhone and iPod Touch!
Can you identify all 4 differences in the photos before the countdown timer runs out? With just three `hints` to help you survive the countdown, challenge yourself to earn a position in the global high score chart.

name: Biomes
description: A massively-multiplay world where players work together to build, farm, fish, and solve puzzles to fight back against the infectious Muck.

name: Enigmas da Escuridão
description:
Game creates a society that fights the Obscures, people who work in the dark to create chaos in the cities of the world and you as a mystery hunter will unravel several enigmas to stop these evil events of the Obscures.

This first riddle and you're trapped in a dream that never ends and only you can crack this mystery!

name: Sports 5
description: Sports 5 is an unreleased unlicensed sports compilation game for the Sega Genesis and SNES. It was being developed by FarSight Technologies and was set to be published by Active Enterprises.

name: Hashire! Chuukan Kanrishoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Keisatsusho kara no Dasshutsu
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Saiko Mystery Series Vol. 2 - Angel City
description: Sin descripción

name: Shikisai Kankaku Test Art na Kyouyou Nou-tre Joushiki IQ Check
description: Sin descripción

name: Saikyou Horror Akumu no Tobira: imi ga Wakaru to Kowai Nazotoki Toshidensetsu Kaidan Suiri Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Nemurenu Yoru no Mikaketsu Mystery
description: Sin descripción

name: Mojito the Cat: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Crafting Block World: Magic Dungeons Adventure
description: Endless sandbox adventure with blocks that will help you mine ores and craft your ideal world!

name: Tetsudou Nippon! RealPro Tokkyu Soukou! Nagoya Tetsudou-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Maanu: Academic Version
description: Surf, dive and jump from island to island to make it to the end. This parkour will test your skill. As Maanu, the water goddess use your skills and the very water around you to your advantage, traveling far and wide through this abstract nature.

name: Imprecision
description: Imprecision is a first/third person, action game set in The Middle Ages. In Imprecision, you play as a lone archer, Örvar, who is training to take down The Black Knights of Bjørn and their kingdom. You are determined to defeat King Bjørn the Bloodthirsty and take back what is yours.

name: Rusty Robot Wants to Cry
description: Immerse yourself in the world of retro-games as a roller robot. From platformers and side-scrollers, to the legendary Arkanoid, Xonix, Digger and Snake. Jump across platforms and fight glitch bosses. Colorful graphics, effects galore, and chiptune music. Anyone but a robot would cry from nostalgia!

name: Memories of a Spy
description: Collect intel, forge documents, blend in, hunt the mole. Immerse yourself in this first-person 1960s spy simulator. Work for CIA, MI6, SDECE, BND, or KGB. Defend your country or betray it, or choose to leave it all behind to live a normal life... as long as you can.

name: Project Fantasy
description:
In revealing this project, IOI stated, “We are building a new world, a new IP – an online fantasy RPG. A world and a game built from the core to entertain players and expand for many years to come.”

IOI added: “For many, this journey is also a deeply personal one that began long before we started making games for a living – and it started with the fantasy genre. From the ‘Fighting Fantasy’ books compelling you to choose your path, alone, against wizards, lizards, and thief kings. To the togetherness, camaraderie, agony, and delight found around the tabletop."

“For some it meant taking the role of a game master: Part storyteller, part AI opponent, part guide, part villain. For everyone around that table it meant creativity, imagination, building a world together, and a shared goal in creating a great game experience."

“This idea – that a diverse group of individuals with different skills and strengths can work together and become more than the sum of their parts – is what inspires us. It inspires the fantasy world we are building – and it inspires how we build it.”

name: Farming Simulator: Farm, Tractor, Experience Logic Games - Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Farmer Simulator is the ultimate combination of fun, strategy, and brain-teasing gameplay. Step into the shoes of a farmer and embark on a thinking adventure like no other.

name: Soccer Kids
description: A game about soccer, made by people who suck at playing soccer. Guide your team of nerds to victory in this tight, tactical soccer game!

name: Koa and the Five Pirates of Mara: Collector's Edition

name: Capsman 3D
description:
Capsman 3D! The new battle of the coffee bean can start now!

Capsman now has to save the coffee beans from its enemies but once again the biodegradable capsules will give him more energy for reaching the goal. Who plays with Capsman 3D must overcome many obstacles and enemies even more insidious.

name: Crazy Trip
description: Start your journey in the world of the coolest cars, dashing race and logical tasks. All the tasks are introduced in interactive form for better perception of children.

name: Top Farm
description:
Build the land you’ve always wanted. Make it your own. Invite your dearest friends and help it grow!
Your story awaits in Top Farm, a place away from the noise and stress of modern life. Here you can explore the peace and prosperity of a land in tune with nature, experience the thrill of an honest day’s work, and meet new friends who share in every celebration.
With just a touch of magic around every corner, Top Farm offers surprises, adventure and the satisfaction only found in a place of your very own.

name: Sum Idea
description: Slide numbers to match patterns - not as easy as it looks! 140 puzzles to win, can you beat Professor Addkins? A great brain game suitable for young and old.

name: Super Hero Warehouse
description: The villains are dropping dangerous and hazardous containers on earth. A Super Hero is here to protect us. You are The Super Hero and you are in command. You need to arrange and align these dangerous Metal Boxes in lines so they can be shipped off and destroyed. You can push the steel boxes right or left to align them evenly. You can jump over one box (or 2 if you get the power-up) if you need to. Once you have created a full line on boxes, they will disappear.

name: Square & Line
description:
Dare your dexterity and skill with this free game. Clear different obstacles and achieve the highest score. How far can you go?
Touch drag on screen to move square avoid paths.

name: Neve
description: Neve is a non-linear interactive fiction in which your decisions can completely change the course of history. Manage your team, race against time and unravel the mysteries surrounding your ship's crash in this suffocating retrofuturistic thriller that will have you hooked from the first second.
